V05n745:649: yadi cāsya nīcapuruṣo'satkāraṃ kariṣyati na citrīkariṣyati |
V05n745:658: tato nīlabhūtirbrāhmaṇo vṛddhavṛddhairmathurānivāsibhirbrāhmaṇaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:659: adrākṣīnnīlabhūtirbrāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyomaprabhālaṅkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṃgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakamanyataraṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśrityaṃ śāntena īryāpathena niṣaṇṇam dṛṣṭvā ca vismayotphulladṛṣṭiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:660: praṇidhāya manaḥ sahendriyairvidhivad vāk ca śarīrameva ca |
V05n745:666: puruṣarṣabha nāsti te vyathā na viṣādo na bhayaṃ na ca klamaḥ |
V05n745:667: na ca te vyasanaṃ kutaḥ kali rna ca bhūteṣu kadācidakṣamā ||5 ||
V05n745:668: na ca dhāvasi nātilīyase na ca santapyasi nāpi hṛṣyase |
V05n745:669: satataṃ śubhameva te manaḥ satataṃ merurivācalādhipaḥ ||6 ||
V05n745:672: na ca te'sti mune katham kathā vimatirnāsti na saṃśayaḥ kvacit |
V05n745:673: svayameva na te parāparaṃ viditaṃ sarvamavedi vidyayā ||8 ||
V05n745:675: samameva hi te priyāpriyaṃ satataṃ prītikarastatheryase ||9 ||
V05n745:677: vividānumataṃ prabhāṣase triṣu lokeṣu ca te stṛtaṃ yaśaḥ ||10 ||
V05n745:679: upagamya mune punaḥ punaḥ paripṛcchanti na cābhiṣūyase ||11 ||
V05n745:681: pratiyānti vinītasaṃśayāścaraṇau vandya ca te mahāmune ||12 ||
V05n745:683: atha cīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ ruciraṃ gautama sarvameva te ||13 ||
V05n745:687: na ca manyasi nāvamanyase sakalaṃ lokamimaṃ sadaivatam ||15 ||
V05n745:688: na ca vismayase kadāvana prakṛtistheṣu calācaleṣu ca |
V05n745:697: bhavaduḥkhamidaṃ sahetukaṃ bhavaduḥkhasya ca yaḥ parikṣayaḥ |
V05n745:700: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kuto'dhikastriṣu lokeṣvapi naiva vidyate ||21 ||
V05n745:701: pratighānunayā na santi te na ca te santi mune parisravāḥ |
V05n745:702: anurodhavirodhavigrahāḥ satataṃ suvrata naiva naiva te ||22 ||
V05n745:703: apahāya mune priyapriye sukhaduḥkhe vi (ṣamaṃ samaṃ tathā) |
V05n745:705: vyasane na ca nāma nirmanā na ca nāmonnamase praśaṃsayā |
V05n745:706: ayaśaśca yaśaśca te samaṃ samamākruṣṭamathāpi vanditam ||24 ||
V05n745:710: samameva ca varttase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu vākṣu ca ||26 ||
V05n745:712: ṛṣibhiśca sadā mahātmabhirna ca te vikriyate sthiraṃ manaḥ ||27 ||
V05n745:713: pravaro'hamito na manyase' tyavaro'hamito na manyase |
V05n745:714: sadṛśo'hamito na manyase trividhā mānavidhā na santi te ||28 ||
V05n745:716: tṛṇakāṣṭhasamaṃ mahāmune carasīdaṃ hi sadevakaṃ jagat ||29 ||
V05n745:718: adhivāsayase nagendravanna ca te pravyathate sthiraṃ manaḥ ||30 ||
V05n745:721: na ca śocasi nātha nāsti me na ca te santi mune parigrahā |
V05n745:723: na ca lābhamavāpya hṛṣyase tadalābhācca layaṃ na gacchasi |
V05n745:726: asayo niśitāḥ śarāśca te na vikurvanti manaḥ kadācana ||34 ||
V05n745:727: na kathāṃ kathayasyanarthikāṃ na ca yā durjanasevitā kathā |
V05n745:729: sāmiṣā na ca yā nānumatā mahātmabhiḥ ||35 ||
V05n745:730: pravivekakathāḥ sukhāvahāḥ praśamaṃ yāḥ pravadanti kevalam |
V05n745:731: kathayasyatidevatāḥ kathāḥ kathitā yā vinayanti kilviṣam ||36 ||
V05n745:732: madhurāṇi va saṅgatāni ca svabhinītāni ca sāravanti ca |
V05n745:733: vacanāni mune prabhāṣate jagadarthāya viniścitāni ca ||37 ||
V05n745:735: piśunāḥ paruṣāḥ śaṭhāśca ye bhagavaṃstaiḥ saha saṅgataṃ na te ||38 ||
V05n745:736: aśaṭhā ṛjavaśca ye narāḥ śucayaḥ satyaratā jitendriyāḥ |
V05n745:737: satataṃ ca samīkṣyakāriṇo bhagavaṃstaiḥ saha saṅgataṃ tava ||39 ||
V05n745:738: dharmajña nayajña pudgalajña tvāṃ vande ṣaḍabhijña sarvadaiva |
V05n745:739: kṣetrajña mune parāparajña tvāṃ vande śirasā nayānayajña ||40 ||
V05n745:742: na tava guṇamahārṇavasya pāraṃ jagati pumānadhigantumārya śaktaḥ ||41 ||
V05n745:745: yathā yathā tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:758: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya mathurāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
V05n745:759: tena khalu samayena mathurāyāṃ nakṣatrarātraḥ pratyupasthitaḥ |
V05n745:760: atha yā devatā mathurāyāmadhyuṣitā tasyā etadabhavat |
V05n745:762: mama nakṣatrarātrerantarāyaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā bhagavataḥ purastādvinagno'sthāt |
V05n745:764: apraticchannastāvaddevate mātṛgrāmo na śobhate prāgeva vinagna iti |
V05n745:765: atha sā devatā jihnīya nagnarūpā ekānte'pakrāntā |
V05n745:766: tato bhagavān mārgādapakramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:770: utkūlanikūlāḥ sthāṇukaṇṭakapradhānā bahupāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallā uccandrabhaktāḥ pracuramātṛgrāmā iti |
V05n745:771: atha bhagavānnapraviśanneva mathurāṃ yena gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ tenopasankrāntaḥ |
V05n745:772: upasaṅkramya gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanamabhyavagāhyānyataradvṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya |
V05n745:773: aśrauṣurmāthurā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavān piṇḍāya prāviśat devatayā viheṭhitaḥ |
V05n745:774: apraviśanneva mathurāṃ gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ gata iti śrutvā ca punaḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ sthālīpākaṃ samupānīya śakaṭe āropya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:775: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:776: ekānta niṣaṇṇān śrāddhān māthurān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n745:777: atha śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:778: ihāsmābhirbhadanta bhagavantamuddiśya śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya śakaṭaṃ pūrṇamānītam |
V05n745:779: tad bhagavān pratigṛhṇātu anukampā mupādāya iti |
V05n745:781: gacchānanda yāvanto bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanamupaniśritya viharanti tān sarvānupasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātaya |
V05n745:783: evaṃ bhadanta ityāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvanto bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanamupaniśritya viharanti tān sarvānupasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:786: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanamupaniśritya viharanti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitāḥ |
V05n745:790: atha māthurāḥ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavadyāvaddhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāttasthurayācamānaṃ cāhuḥ |
V05n745:791: bhagavatā bhadanta te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāśca vinītāḥ |
V05n745:792: ayaṃ bhadanta gardabhako yakṣo'smākaṃ dīrgharātramavairiṇāṃ vairī |
V05n745:796: aho vata bhagavān gardabhakaṃ yakṣaṃ vinayedanukampāmupādāyeti |
V05n745:797: tena khalu samayena gardabhako yakṣastasyāmeva parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo'bhuta sannipatita |
V05n745:805: yadi māmuddiśya cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vihāraṃ kārayantīti |
V05n745:810: tatra bhagavatā gardabhako yakṣaḥ pañcaśataparivāro vinītaḥ |
V05n745:812: evaṃ śaro yakṣo vano yakṣaḥ ālikāvendā maghā yakṣiṇī vinītā |
V05n745:813: atha bhagavatā ṛddhyā mathurāṃ praviśya timisikā yakṣiṇī pañcaśataparivārā vinītā |
V05n745:820: tatra otalāyano nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ |
V05n745:821: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya otalāyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
V05n745:822: anyatamasminpradeśe pañcamātrāṇi kārṣikaśatāni udrajaḥśiraskāni śaṇaśāṭīnivastāni halaṃ vāhayamti |
V05n745:827: atha tadbalīvardasahasraṃ yoktrāṇi varatrāṇicchittvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntam |
V05n745:830: bhagavatā teṣāṃ tribhiḥ padairdharmo deśito yāvaccāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ |
V05n745:832: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajatāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:833: kiṃ bhavanta ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ kārṣikaśatairebhiśca balīvardaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo viṣākena kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttā daridragṛheṣupapannāḥ |
V05n745:840: ebhiśca balīvardaistatraiva pravrajitaiḥ kṣudrānukṣudraiḥ śikṣāpadairanādaraṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:842: yatte kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajitāstasya karmaṇo vipākena mamāntikātsatyadarśanaṃ kṛtamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāmiti vistaraḥ |
V05n745:848: tena ca pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakaṃ saṃghaṃ bhojayitvā praṇidhānaṃ karoti |
V05n745:849: sa yaccintayati yatprārthayate tatsarvaṃ pratilabhate iti |
V05n745:850: atha otalāyano brāhmaṇaḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:851: adhivāsayatu me bhagavan gautama śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
V05n745:852: pūrvavadyāvad bhuktavantaṃ viditvā ghautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānmithyāpraṇidhānaṃ cintayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:853: yāvanta ime śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā mayā bhojitāḥ sarva ete mama balīvardā syuriti |
V05n745:854: atha bhagavānotalāyanasya brāhmaṇasya cetasā cittamājñāya otalāyanaṃ brāhmaṇamidamavocat |
V05n745:859: atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gataḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapya evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:861: otalāyanena bhikṣavo brāhmaṇena mithyāpraṇidhānasamutthaṃ pāpakaṃ cittamutpāditam |
V05n745:864: atha bhagavāṃstasyā eva rātreratyayādotalāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣadāyuṣmatā ānandena paścācchramaṇena |
V05n745:870: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena kacaṃgalā vṛddhā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:875: tataḥ kacaṃgalā udakaghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā tvaritatvaritā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā |
V05n745:876: dadarśa kacaṃgalā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā cānuvyaṃjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyomaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam |
V05n745:878: sā ūrdhvabāhuḥ putra putreti bhagavantaṃ pariṣvaḍktumārabdhā |
V05n745:881: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ etāṃ vṛddhāṃ vārayata |
V05n745:884: sā cedeṣā nivāritā mama gātrasya śleṣaṇāt ||42 ||
V05n745:890: tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtāṃ yāṃ (śrutvā)
V05n745:891: kacaṃgalayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:893: idamasmākaṃ bhadantaṃ na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā |
V05n745:895: anādyakālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:899: durgatibhyaḥ samudghṛtya svarge mokṣe ca te aham |
V05n745:900: sthāpitā suprayatnena sādhu te duṣkaraṃ kṛtam ||46 ||
V05n745:901: ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntā |
V05n745:902: atha kacaṃgalā apareṇa samayena svāminamanujñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā |
V05n745:903: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣpaṇṇā |
V05n745:905: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n745:908: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:911: yadā bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saṃkṣepeṇoddiśya vihāraṃ praviśati pratisaṃlayanāya tadā taṃ kacaṃgalā vistareṇa vyākaroti |
V05n745:913: eṣāgrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāṃ yaduta kacaṃgalā bhikṣuṇī iti |
V05n745:914: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:915: kiṃ bhadanta kacaṃgalāyāḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena vṛddhā pravrajitā |
V05n745:916: kiṃ ca karma kṛtaṃ yena daridrā dāsī ca saṃvṛttā bhagavāṃśca paścimena garbhavāsena dhāritaḥ |
V05n745:921: kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvadyāvat phalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n745:922: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartamānasya eṣā mama mātā babhūva |
V05n745:928: na cānayā puṇyamaheśākhyasaṃvarttanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yathā mahāmāyayā yenāhamanayā paścime garbhavāsena dhāritaḥ |
V05n745:929: kāśyape ca samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitā yāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣuṇyo dāsīvādena samudācaritāḥ |
V05n745:931: yattatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalamāyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:932: yasyāśco pādhyāyikāyāḥ sakāśe pravrajitā sā bhagavatā kāśyapena samyak saṃbuddhena sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāmagrā nirdiṣṭā |
V05n745:933: tatrānayā maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyak saṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ na ca kaścid guṇagaṇo'dhigataḥ |
V05n745:934: anena kuśalamūlena yo'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma mānavo vyākṛto bhaviṣyati |
V05n745:935: tvaṃ mānava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhatsamyaksaṃbuddhaṃ iti |
V05n745:937: yathaiṣā me upādhyāyikā bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāmagrā nirdiṣṭā |
V05n745:938: evaṃ māmapyasau bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sūtravibhāgakartrīṇāmagrāṃ nirdiśediti |
V05n745:940: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ |
V05n745:950: adrākṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati |
V05n745:953: tato rajjuṃ tipyakaṃ ca gopāyitvā sthitaḥ |
V05n745:957: tato'sau brāhmaṇo mahardhiko'yaṃ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti viditvātiprasannaḥ kathayati |
V05n745:963: chittveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇaṃ caret ||iti ||47 ||
V05n745:965: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavadyāvat |
V05n745:967: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭīparītadehaḥ |
V05n745:968: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau naiva sthito buddhamanorathena ||48 ||
V05n745:972: atha bhagavāñchūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vairaṃbhyamanuprāpto vairaṃbhye viharati naḍerapicumandamūle |
V05n745:973: tena khalu samayena vairaṃbhyeṣvagnidatto nāma brāhmaṇarājo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca |
V05n745:974: aśrauṣīdagnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śūraseneṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vairaṃbhyamanuprāpto vairaṃbhye viharati naḍerapicumandamūle iti |
V05n745:976: śramaṇo gautamaḥ sarvasāmantarājānaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito'rhatsaṃmataḥ |
V05n745:979: bālo vata bhavanto'gnidatto brāhmaṇarājo yasya grāmakṣetramupaniśritya śramaṇo gautamo viharati na ca satkaroti |
V05n745:980: yattvahaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyamiti viditvā mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena vairaṃbhyānniṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:981: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:982: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamagnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n745:983: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarāja utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:984: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān gautamastraimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti |
V05n745:986: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatastūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya magavato'ntikāt prakāntaḥ |
V05n745:988: pratidivasamaṣṭādaśaprakāraṃ khādyakaṃ pacata nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ ca prabhūtaṃ bhaktam |
V05n745:991: yo bhojayati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti |
V05n745:992: sa evaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā rātrau śayitaḥ |
V05n745:995: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītaḥ saṃtaptaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghu ladhveva mahārhaśayanādutthāya kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:996: mā haiva me ato nidhanaṃ rājyāccyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāya iti |
V05n745:997: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa |
V05n745:1002: yadyahamenamanusaṃvarṇayeyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā śramaṇo gautamaḥ prasādamutpādayiṣyati |
V05n745:1008: aho vata me na rājyacyutiḥ syād (vā)
V05n745:1010: upādhyāya ko'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na rājyacyutirbhavennāpi jīvitasyāntarāya iti |
V05n745:1012: yadi devastraimāsīmadarśanapathe tiṣṭhati evaṃ devasya na rājyacyutirbhavati nāpi jīvitasyāntarāyaḥ |
V05n745:1018: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti |
V05n745:1020: āyuṣmānānandaḥ kālyamevotthāya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ yāvat paśyatyagnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya pauruṣeyā alpotsukān kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti |
V05n745:1024: na tvagnidattena brāhmaṇarājena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghastraimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ |
V05n745:1025: te yūyamalpotsukāstiṣṭhatha nāhāraṃ sajjīkurutha nāsanaprajñaptim kiṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktacchedaṃ kariṣyatīti |
V05n745:1028: paṃcānāṃ śatānāmāhāraṃ sajjīkurutaṃ praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ ceti |
V05n745:1033: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti |
V05n745:1036: athāyuṣmānando yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya etatprakaraṇaṃ bhagavato vistareṇārocayati |
V05n745:1038: gacchānanda saṃghāṭīmādāya paścācchramaṇaṃ ca vairaṃbhye rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocaya |
V05n745:1039: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavantaḥ utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ bhojayatviti |
V05n745:1040: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāya praścācchramaṇaṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgārakeṣvārocayati |
V05n745:1041: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavanta utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ sa bhojayatviti vairaṃbhyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ kathayanti |
V05n745:1043: api tu anena kalirājena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam |
V05n745:1044: nānyena kenacit traimāsīmupanimaṃtrya buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyaḥ |
V05n745:1045: yo bhojayati tasya badho daṇḍa iti |
V05n745:1046: yāvaduttarāpathāt sārthavāhaḥ paṃcāśvaśatāni paṇyamādāya vairaṃbhyamanuprāptaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati |
V05n745:1052: śrutaṃ cānena rājñā ayaṃ cāyaṃ ca kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
V05n745:1058: āryānanda mayā aśvājāneyasya dvau yavaprasthau prajñaptau |
V05n745:1060: yadi bhagavānutsahate yavān paribhoktumahaṃ bhagavataḥ prasthadvayamanuprayacchāmi |
V05n745:1065: mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāni |
V05n745:1066: avaśyaṃbhāvīni mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni ko'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati |
V05n745:1067: na hi karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante |
V05n745:1075: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktuṃ sa śilākāṃ gṛhṇātviti |
V05n745:1076: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śilākāṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:1079: bhagavannahaṃ vāyvābādhiko notsahe traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktumiti |
V05n745:1082: tato bhagavān bhikṣudvayaunaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye varṣā upagataḥ |
V05n745:1083: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau triśaṅkuṃ parvataṃ gatvā varṣā upagatau |
V05n745:1084: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa divyayā sudhayā pravāritau |
V05n745:1089: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratyaṃśamādāya yenānyatamā vṛddhā strī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1094: api tveṣā taruṇikā dārikā asyāṃ anuprayaccha |
V05n745:1097: bhagini śakṣyasi tvaṃ tathāgatasyārthāya yavān parikarmīkartumiti |
V05n745:1107: yadyahamasyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kariṣye gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānametadvidyate (yadasau na vijñāsyatīti )
V05n745:1110: rājño bhaginī cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1113: cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvarasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasya saptamasya |
V05n745:1114: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātkathaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1115: iha bhagini rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ śiraḥ snātopavāsairalaṃ kṛtasya upari prāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhamakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ (sarva) sauvarṇam |
V05n745:1117: yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ pūrvavadyāvatsarvasauvarṇam |
V05n745:1119: addhāhamasmi rājā cakravartīti cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāma utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya taccakraratnamubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pratigṛhya vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā anuvartayati |
V05n745:1120: jayasva bho cakraratna yenāryaḥ purāṇaścakravartipatha iti |
V05n745:1123: bhyudgamya pūrveṇa prāyāsīdyenāryaḥ pūrāṇaścakravartipathaḥ anveti rājā cakravartī taccakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena |
V05n745:1124: yaśmiṃśca pradeśe taccakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ catu (raṅgeṇaba) lakāyena |
V05n745:1125: ( ye khalu) pūrvaśyāṃ diśi koṭṭarājānaste yena rājā cakravartī tenopasaṃkrāmanti |
V05n745:1129: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca (subhikṣā)
V05n745:1133: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa |
V05n745:1139: nmahāsamudraṃ pratyuttīrya dakṣiṇena paścimenottareṇa prāyāsīdyenāryaḥ purāṇaścakravartipathaḥ |
V05n745:1143: anveti rājā cakravartī taccakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena |
V05n745:1144: yasminpradeśe taccakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī (vāsaṃ kalpayati)
V05n745:1151: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇavahujanamanuṣyāśca |
V05n745:1154: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa |
V05n745:1155: mā ca vaḥ kasyacidadharmacāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso rocatāmiti |
V05n745:1157: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvādasyaivaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1158: rājño bhagivi cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātkathaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1159: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartino hastī bhavati sarvaśvetaḥ kumudavarṇaḥ saptāṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhito'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ |
V05n745:1163: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātaṃ hastidamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedamavocat idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātaṃ hastiratnaṃ kṣiprameva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākamupanayitavyamiti |
V05n745:1164: evaṃ deva iti saṃkhyāto hastidamako rājñaścakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya hastiratnamekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhirupasaṃkrāmati |
V05n745:1171: atha rājā cakravartī taddhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye taddhi (hasti)
V05n745:1175: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvādasyaivaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1176: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃ rūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1177: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartinaḥ aśvo bhavati sarvanīlaḥ kṛṣṇaśirā manojño javano'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ |
V05n745:1180: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātamaśvadamakaṃ dūtena prakoṣyedamavocat |
V05n745:1181: idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātamaśvaratnaṃ kṣiprameva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākamupanayitavyamiti |
V05n745:1182: evaṃ deveti saṃkhyāto'śvādamako rājñaścakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya tadaśvaratnamekāhnā sarvacāraṇairupasaṃkrāmati |
V05n745:1184: tadyathānye aśvā anekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhiparusaṃkramyamānāḥ sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhnanti |
V05n745:1187: dāntaṃ deva bhadramaśvaratnaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate |
V05n745:1188: atha rājā cakravartī aśvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye tadaśvaratnamabhiruhyemāmeva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivī (manvāhiṇḍya)
V05n745:1190: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvādasyaivaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
V05n745:1193: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartino maṇirbhavati aṣṭāṃśo vaiḍūryaḥ śubho jātimānaccho viprasannaḥ anāvilaḥ |
V05n745:1196: ratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmoṃdhakāratamiśrāyāṃ rātryāṃ śanairmandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyutsu niścarantīṣu maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropyodyānabhūmiṃ niryāti sārdhaṃ caturaṃgeṇa valakāyena |
V05n745:1202: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātkathaṃrūpa (sya strīra)
V05n745:1204: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartinaḥ strī bhavati abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikī nātigaurī nātiśyāmā madgurucchanirvātidīrghā nātihrasvā supratiṣṭhitā nātikṛśā nātisthūlā nātyutsadamāṃsā (tanugā) strī |
V05n745:1206: sparśāni gātrāṇi uṣṇe śītasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi kāliṅgaprāvāramṛdusaṃsparśāni |
V05n745:1207: tasyāḥ khalu bhagini sarvaromakūpebhyaścandanagandho vāti mukhācca (utpalagandhaḥ) |
V05n745:1209: nānandaḥ strīratnaṃ vibhajati tāvattayā dārikayā te yavāḥ parikarmitāḥ |
V05n745:1211: ārya anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājñaścakravartinaḥ strīratnaṃ syāmiti |
V05n745:1218: kima) bhūt te ānanda tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdhamantarākathāsamudāhāraḥ |
V05n745:1219: tena hyānanda yāvāṃste'bhūttayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdhamantarākathāsamudāhārastat sarvamasmākaṃ vistareṇārocaya |
V05n745:1223: kasmāttvayānanda tayā dārikayā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ na kṛtam |
V05n745:1225: gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānametadvidyate yadasau dārikā na vijñāsyatīti |
V05n745:1228: sa cettvayā tasyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtamabhaviṣyat sthānametadvidyate yattu yāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartikaṃ cittamutpāditamabhaviṣyat |
V05n745:1229: api tvānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā rājñaścakravartinaḥ strīratnam |
V05n745:1233: iti śrutvā yaiḥ paṃcabhirdārikāśatairdyavūnairbhikṣudvayonānāṃ paṃcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ yavāḥ parikarmitāḥ |
V05n745:1236: yāvadbhagavān yavānparibhoktumārabdhaḥ āyuṣmānānando viklavaḥ aśrūṇi pramoktumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:1237: bhagavatā teṣu janmaparivarteṣu karacaraṇaśiraśchedādīni dānāni dattvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvamavāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavānbhakṣayatīti |
V05n745:1240: bhagavānbhadanta cakravartikule jāto rājyamapahāya prabrajitaḥ karacaraṇaśirādīni dānāni dattvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvamavāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavānbhakṣayatīti |
V05n745:1242: ākṣāṃkṣasi tvamānanda tathāgatasya daṃṣṭrantaravinirgatān yavān paribhoktum |
V05n745:1244: tato bhagavatā āyuṣmata ānandāya daṃṣṭrāntaravinirgatānāṃ yavānā (meko dattaḥ) |
V05n745:1247: yadi tathāgataḥ prākṛtamapyāhāraṃ paribhuṃkte tadapi tathāgatasyānnaśatarasaṃ saṃparivartate |
V05n745:1249: agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavān vairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti |
V05n745:1250: sāmantarājairapi śrutaṃ tairagnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:1251: te praveśaṃ na labhante dvāri sthitāḥ |
V05n745:1252: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutaṃ tena paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ preṣitāni |
V05n745:1254: bahuśo mayā śramaṇo gautamo viheṭhito na kadācidavatāro labdhaḥ |
V05n745:1255: atrāpi tāvadasya praharāmi iti viditvā āyuṣmantamānandamātmānaṃ vinirmāya teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ śakaṭaśatānāṃ purataḥ sthitvā kathayati |
V05n745:1258: (ārya) ānanda agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavānvairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti |
V05n745:1259: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutvaitāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāle rbhagavato'rthāya paṃca śakaṭaśatāni preṣitāni iti |
V05n745:1262: yadi bhagavān ākāśe pātraṃ prasārayati tadapi devāsrayastriṃśā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pūrayanti |
V05n745:1272: tena tāvad dṛṣṭaṃ yāvattāni śakaṭāni nābhiṃ yāvannimagnāni |
V05n745:1274: tatra bhagavatā vairaṃbhye yavāḥ paribhuktāḥ sārdhaṃ dvayonaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
V05n745:1275: āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ triśaṃkuke parvate varṣopagatābhyāṃ divyā sudhā paribhuktā |
V05n745:1278: sa sārthavāhastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya pūrvavadyāvadbhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya praṇidhanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:1279: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī aśvājāneyaḥ putre yuvarājastānyapi paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃcaputraśatāṇi |
V05n745:1280: yā sā dārikā bhagavatā strīratnaṃ yāni pañca dārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti |
V05n745:1281: tato bhagavāṃstasya sārthavāhasya cetasā cittamājñāya taṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat |
V05n745:1282: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ sārthavāha rājā cakravartī aśvājāneyaste putro yuvarājastānyapi paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃcaputraśatāni |
V05n745:1284: tānyapi dyūnāni paṃcadārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti |
V05n745:1288: uṣitāḥ smo mahārāja tava vijite avalokito bhava |
V05n745:1291: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1292: tena khalu samaye nāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ puṇyāhamāgamayaṃstiṣṭhati |
V05n745:1294: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājastenopasaṃkrama |
V05n745:1296: ānando bhikṣurdvāre tiṣṭhati deva draṣṭukāma iti |
V05n745:1297: evamārya iti dauvārikapuruṣaḥ āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1313: uṣitāḥ smo mahārāja tava vijite traimāsīm |
V05n745:1320: devo'pratyakṣitarājyastvaṃ yo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīmupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1325: sa saṃmūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito mahatā jalapariṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇaḥ amātyānāhūya pṛcchati |
V05n745:1332: api tu adyāpyāhāraḥ sajjīkṛta eva 'thāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1333: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:1334: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamagnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarhayati pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n745:1336: atyayo bhagavannatyayaḥ sugata yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīmupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1337: tasya mama bhagavannatyayaṃ jānato'tyayaṃ paśyataḥ atyayamatyayataḥ pratigṛhṇīśvānukampāmupādāya |
V05n745:1338: tathyaṃ te mahārāja atyayamatyayata āgamā yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yastvaṃ tathāgataṃ traimāsīmupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1339: uatastvaṃ mahārāja atyayaṃ jānāsyatyayaṃ paśyasi taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā deśayasi vṛddhireva te pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ |
V05n745:1341: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti |
V05n745:1343: tathāgato mahārāja alpāyuṣke kāle jātaḥ prabhūtaṃ ca kāryaṃ karaṇīyam |
V05n745:1348: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti |
V05n745:1350: yadyahamasyaikabhaktakamapi nādhivāsayāmi sthānametadvidyate yadyagnidatto brāhmaṇarāja uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena |
V05n745:1351: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatastūṣṇīṃ bhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato'ntikāt prakrānto yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmtaḥ |
V05n745:1352: upasaṃkramyāmātyānāmaṃtrayate bhavantaḥ ko'sau upāyaḥ syādyena sarvo'yamāhāro buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhukto bhavediti |
V05n745:1358: bhavanto yāvānayamāhāraḥ sarvametatsamantāt pṛthivyāmākirata iti taiḥ sarvaṃ samantādākīrṇam |
V05n745:1359: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājastāmeva rātriṃ śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya pūrvabadyāvadbhagavān purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:1361: idānīmayaṃ kalirājo vibhavaṃ darśayatīti viditvā khādanīyabhojanīyasya pṛthivyāmākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ |
V05n745:1366: yaḥ kaścidādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ mukhābhyavahāryaṃ pādena spṛśantīti viditvā bhikṣunāmantrayate sma |
V05n745:1367: amukena bhikṣavo mahallabhikṣuṇā saṃjātāmarṣeṇa khādanīyabhojanīyasya mukhābhyavahāryasya pṛthivyāmākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro datta iti |
V05n745:1371: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati pūrvavadyāvaddhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
V05n745:1373: yā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
V05n745:1374: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1375: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavastrayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:1376: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte'sthāt |
V05n745:1380: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:1381: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yena karacaraṇaśiracchedādinā dānasaṃbhāreṇa yāvaddinajanaṃ saṃtarpya kalpāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yattrayaṃ sattvārthe ātmānaṃ parikhedyāpagatasarvakāryo vairaṃbhye koṭarayavānparibhuktavānsārdhaṃ bhikṣudyvūnaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
V05n745:1384: tathāgatenaiva etāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n745:1385: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokacidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān |
V05n745:1387: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhāntāmanyatamo gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ pāñcaśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ brāhmaṇakānmaṃtrānpāṭhayati |
V05n745:1388: sarvalokasya cātyarthaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito'rhatsaṃmataḥ |
V05n745:1389: yata eva vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptastata eva taṃ na kaścitsatkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati |
V05n745:1392: yāvatsaṃbahulāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptāḥ |
V05n745:1393: tato nānāsūpikarasopetasya bhaktasya pātrāṇi pūrayitvā nirgacchanti |
V05n745:1395: bho bhikṣavaḥ paśyāmi kīdṛśaḥ piṇḍapāto labdha iti |
V05n745:1398: nārhantīme muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum |
V05n745:1402: nārhantyeva ime muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum |
V05n745:1404: tatra ca dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadraukalyāṇāśayau |
V05n745:1407: mahātmāna ete'rhantyeva divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhoktuṃ na koṭarayavāniti |
V05n745:1409: yau'sau vipaśyitathāgatena gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:1411: nāni paṃca māṇavakaśatāni etānyeva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni |
V05n745:1412: yau tau dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadrau kalyāṇāśayau etāveva tau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū |
V05n745:1413: yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāmantike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ dyvūnaiśca paṃcabhirmāṇavakaśatairanumoditaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu nānumoditaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenaitarhi tathāgatena vairaṃbhye koṭarayavāḥ paribhuktāḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣūdyvūnaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
V05n745:1415: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmanāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavadyāvadekāntaśulkeṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:1420: atha bhagavāndakṣiṇapaṃcāle janapadacārikāṃ carannayodhyāmanuprāptaḥ ayodhyāyāṃ viharati nadyā gaṅgāyāstīte |
V05n745:1424: sādhu me bhagavaṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato'ntike saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā eko vyapakṛṣṭo'pramattaḥ ātāpi prahitātmā vihareyam |
V05n745:1425: eko vyapakṛṣṭo'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmānyadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāni vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikā pravrajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasāṃsaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayeyam |
V05n745:1426: kṣīṇā me jātirūṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
V05n745:1427: evamukte bhagavān yena gaṅgā nadī tena vyavalokayan vyavalokayati |
V05n745:1430: paśyasiṃ tvaṃ bhikṣo nadyā gaṅgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandhamuhyamānam |
V05n745:1431: evaṃ bhadanta sa cedeṣa na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyati |
V05n745:1439: evameṣabhikṣo dāruskandho'nupūrveṇa samudranimno bhaviṣyati samudrapravaṇaḥ samudraprāgbhāraḥ |
V05n745:1440: evameva sa cettvaṃ bhikṣo na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi |
V05n745:1443: evaṃ hi tvaṃ bhikṣo anupūrveṇa nirvānanimno bhaviṣyasi nirvānapravaṇo nirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ |
V05n745:1444: nāhaṃ bhadanta jāne kimapārimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīram |
V05n745:1450: sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato'ntikātsaṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā pūrvavadyāvat nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
V05n745:1455: manuṣyagrāha iti yathāpī haikaḥ saṃsṛṣṭo viharati gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ sahanandī sahaśokaḥ |
V05n745:1456: sa sukhiteṣu sukhito duḥkhiteṣu dukhitaḥ utpannotpanneṣu kiṃ karaṇīyeṣu samādāya paryavasānānuvartī bhaviṣyati |
V05n745:1457: amanuṣyagrāha iti yathāpīhaika iti praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ caratītyanenāhaṃ śīlena vā vratena vā (tapena vā)
V05n745:1460: āvartagrāha iti yathāpīhaikaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvartate |
V05n745:1461: antaḥpūtībhāva iti yathāpīhaiko duḥśīlo bhavati pāpadharmā antaḥpūriravasrutaḥ kaṣaṃvakajātaḥ śaṃkhasvarasamācāraḥ |
V05n745:1463: evaṃ hi sa cettvaṃ bhikṣo nāpārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi pūrvavadyāvannirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ |
V05n745:1464: atha sa bhikṣurbhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1466: eko vyapakṛṣṭo'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā viharan yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā āgārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayate kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmityājñātavān |
V05n745:1468: tena khalu samayena nando gopālako bhagavato nātīdūre sthito'bhūt |
V05n745:1470: tena daṇḍenāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ sanchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu cittamutpādayati yadyahaṃ kāyaṃ cā cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ syādato nidānaṃ nandasya gopālasya kathābyākṣepamiti viditvā bhagavato'ntike cittamabhiprasādya kālagataścāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ |
V05n745:1471: atha nando gopālako daṇḍamekānte upanikṣipya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1480: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n745:1487: labheyāhaṃ bhadantaṃ svākhyāte dhamavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryam |
V05n745:1488: kiṃ cāpiṃ nanda daharā gāvastaruṇavatsā jñāsyanti svakasvakāni gokulāni |
V05n745:1490: apitu karaṇīyametadgopālakena yathāpi tat svāmināṃ bhaktācchadanaṃ svīkurvatā |
V05n745:1491: atha nando gopālako bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1492: tato bhayaṃ bhayamityuccaiḥ śabdaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pradhāvitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:1498: tān dṛṣṭvā anye'pi gopālakā aśvapālakāstṛṇahārakāḥ kāṣṭhahārakāḥ pathājīvā utpathājīvāśca manuṣyāḥ pradhāvitumārabdhāḥ |
V05n745:1507: tataścāsau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā itaścāmutaśca santrastāḥ |
V05n745:1518: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāmeva varṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo'bhūtsannipatitaḥ |
V05n745:1519: athāyuṣmān śāriputraściraprakrāntaṃ nandaṃ gopālakaṃ viditvā bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:1520: kasmādbhadanta bhagavatā nando gopālakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitukāmaḥ punarapyagārāyodyojitaḥ |
V05n745:1521: asthānametacchāriputrāvanakāśo yannando gupālakaḥ punarapi gṛhī agāramadhyāvatsyati sannidhikāraparibhoge kāmān paribhokṣyati |
V05n745:1523: idānīṃ nando gopālakaṃ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā āgamiṣyati |
V05n745:1524: sa yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāyāsākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyati kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
V05n745:1525: athāpareṇa samayena nando gopālakaḥ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1528: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣu bhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n745:1529: labdhavān nando gopālakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam |
V05n745:1531: dharmatā aciropapannasya devaputrasya devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittanyutpadyante |
V05n745:1538: na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam |
V05n745:1540: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraścalavimalakuṇḍaladharaḥ pūrvavadyāvatsarvaṃ gaṅgātīramudāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakīrya bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
V05n745:1541: atha bhagavān maṇḍukapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān |
V05n745:1542: yāṃ śrutvā pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1544: eṣo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
V05n745:1545: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāṃvajjīvaṃ prānopetaṃ śaraṇagatamamiprasannam |
V05n745:1546: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputro vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparibhukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśamāgatastayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:1550: kiṃ bhagavannimāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmāsahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraścatvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:1551: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatirna śakro devendro na catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:1552: api tu nandena gopālena daṇḍena vāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ sa cchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu mā nandasya gopālakasya dharmavikṣepo bhaviṣyatīti niścalastūṣṇīmavasthito mamāntike cittamabhiprasādya kālagataścāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣupapannaḥ |
V05n745:1556: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:1557: kiṃ bhadanta nandena gopālena pañcaśataparivāreṇa karma kṛtaṃ yena gopālakeṣupapanno bhagavataśca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1558: maṇḍūkapūrviṇā devaputreṇa kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena maṇḍūkeṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti |
V05n745:1560: tenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvat phalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n745:1561: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminneva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi |
V05n745:1570: tāvarthārthinau tasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntau pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayataḥ |
V05n745:1573: yadyahamanayoradyaivādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayiṣyāmi arthārthināvetau na bhūya upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ |
V05n745:1574: tena sarvasaṃghaṃ saṃnipātya tadadhikaraṇaṃ saṃghamadhye upanikṣipya na ekāntī kṛtam |
V05n745:1575: ataḥ parasminnapi divase tasya karvaṭake karaṇīyamutpannam |
V05n745:1589: tairapyanusaṃvarṇitameva me tadupādhyāya gopālakairyathā tadadhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitamiti |
V05n745:1590: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau tripiṭo bhikṣureṣa evāsau gopālakastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:1591: yānyasya tāni paṃca sārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsikānāṃ śatāni etānyeva paṃca gopālakaśatāni |
V05n745:1592: yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śravakasaṃgho gopālakavādena samudācaritaḥ |
V05n745:1593: sārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsikaiścānusaṃvarṇitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni paṃcaśataparivāro gopālakeṣūpapannaḥ |
V05n745:1595: yadanena paṭhitaḥ svādyāyitaḥ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalamāyatanakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tenaitarhi paṃcaśataparivāreṇa mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1596: maṇḍūkapūrvyapi devaputraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane bhikṣurāsīt |
V05n745:1597: prāhāṇikaḥ sa janapadacārikāṃ caran anyatamasminkarvaṭake vihāramanuprāptaḥ |
V05n745:1598: sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā manasikāraṃ vāhayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:1604: sa madhyame yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvadanye bhikṣavaḥ svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti |
V05n745:1606: sa paścime yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvadapare svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti |
V05n745:1609: ime śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ maṇḍukā iva kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ raṭitā iti |
V05n745:1610: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau prāhāṇiko bhikṣureṣa evāsau maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraḥ |
V05n745:1611: yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakā maṇḍūkavādena samudācaritāḥ |
V05n745:1612: tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni maṇḍūkeṣūpapanno yāvadetarhyapi maṇḍūkeṣvevopapannaḥ |
V05n745:1613: yanmamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣupapannaḥ yatkāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ tenedānīṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:1614: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:1616: atha bhagavānnadīṃ gaṅgāmavatīrṇastatra paṃcabhirhaṃsa-matsya-kūrmaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtaśca |
V05n745:1624: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syād yadvayaṃ bhagavato'ntikāt tribhiḥ padairdharmaṃ śrutvā āhāramāharema iti |
V05n745:1628: dharmatā khalvaciropapannasya devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittānyutpadyante |
V05n745:1635: pūrvavadyāvat mandārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāmutsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā bhagavatsāmantakena nadīṃ gaṅgāmavabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairākīryaṃ bhagavatsāmantakenānuparivāryāvasthitāḥ |
V05n745:1636: bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1639: ete vayaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
V05n745:1642: atha te matsyakacchapahaṃsapūrviṇo devaputrā vaṇija iva labdhalābhāḥ pūrvavadyāvatsvabhavanaṃ gatāḥ |
V05n745:1643: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:1644: kiṃ bhadanta ebhirhaṃsakacchapamatmyaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena haṃsakacchapamatsyeṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti |
V05n745:1646: ebhireva bhikṣavo haṃsamatsyakacchapaiḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāṇi labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n745:1647: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminneva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loke udapādi pūrvavadyāvatsa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīmupaniśṛtya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve |
V05n745:1652: yatkāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhhe brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:1653: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:1655: atha bhagavānnadīṃ gaṅgāmuttīrṇaḥ paṃcamātraiḥ pretaśataiḥ parivṛto dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ svakeśasaṃchannaiḥ parvatopamakukṣibhiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhairādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitaiḥ ekajvālībhūtaiḥ |
V05n745:1657: vayaṃ bhadanta pretā vinipatitaśarīrāḥ pūrvakarmāvabādhena pānīyaṃ nāsādayāmaḥ |
V05n745:1661: eṣā hi śītalajalā susamṛddhatoyā bhāgīrathī vahati sarvajanopabhogyā |
V05n745:1664: eṣāsmākaṃ vahati hi śuṣkatoyā bhāgīrathī sarvajanopabhogyā |
V05n745:1665: paśyāma etāṃ rudhiramalena pūrṇāṃ rakṣanti caināṃ saparaśudaṇḍahastāḥ ||50 || iti |
V05n745:1668: kasmānna tarpayasi tīvratṛṣābhibhūtān kṛpā na tava bālajanasya duḥkhaiḥ ||51 || iti ||
V05n745:1670: nāhaṃ bhayānna puruṣādapi vā janasya śāṭhyena vāpi viṣamaṃ jalamutsṛjāmi |
V05n745:1671: eṣā tu duṣkṛtamahāvaraṇāvṛtānāṃ śoṣaṃ jalaṃ vrajati ko'tra mamāparādhaḥ ||52 || iti
V05n745:1674: evaṃ bhadanta iti āyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pretān santarpayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:1675: tatra pretāḥ sūcīmukhavānnaḥ śaknuvati mukhaṃ vivartayitum |
V05n745:1682: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:1683: kiṃ bhadanta ebhiḥ pretaiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena preteṣūpapannāḥ |
V05n745:1687: ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n745:1688: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'sminneva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā udapādi |
V05n745:1689: pūrvavadyāvatsa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīmupaniśṛtya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve |
V05n745:1691: yadā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsanaṃ na vaistārikaṃ tadālpāśchandayācakā bhikṣavaḥ |
V05n745:1692: yadā tu vaistārikaṃ tadā bahavaśchandayācakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
V05n745:1693: yāvadanyatamasminsaṃsthāgāre paṃcopāsakaśatāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni saṃnipatitāni kenacideva karaṇīyena |
V05n745:1695: te tīvreṇa paryavasthānena kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam |
V05n745:1696: ime śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ pretopapannā iva nityaṃ prasāritakarā iti |
V05n745:1697: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni paṃcopāsakaśatāni etānyeva tāni paṃca pretaśatāni |
V05n745:1698: yadebhiḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakāḥ pretavādena samudācaritāstasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃcajanmaśatāni preteṣupapannāḥ |
V05n745:1701: yatkāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe śaraṇāgamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:1702: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:1704: atha bhagavānnadīṃ gaṅgāmuttīrya dakṣiṇena nāgāvalokitena nadīṃ gaṅgāṃ nirīkṣate |
V05n745:1706: kimarthaṃ bhadanta bhagavānparāvṛtya nadīṃ gaṅgāṃ nirīkṣata iti |
V05n745:1708: icchatha bhikṣavo nadyā gaṅgāyā utpttiṃ śrotum |
V05n745:1709: etasya bhagavankāla etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavānnadyā gaṅgāyā utpattiṃ deśayed bhikṣavaḥ śroṣyanti |
V05n745:1710: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ piṇḍavaṃśo nāma rājā vabhūva |
V05n745:1712: tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphīṭāśca kṣimāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca sadā puṇyaphalavṛkṣāḥ devaḥ kālavarṣī |
V05n745:1715: yāvadasau rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauṃcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe antaḥ-puraparivṛta udyānabhūmiṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1716: yāvadanyatamaḥ puruṣo valīpalitottamāṅgaḥ parijīrṇaśarīrāvayavaḥ pariṇatendriyaḥ kṛśo'lpasthāmo mandamandacāratayā daṇḍamavaṣṭabhya gacchati |
V05n745:1718: ka eṣa bhavantaḥ puruṣo valīpalitottamāṅgaḥ pūrvavadyāvaddaṇḍamabaṣṭabhya gacchatīti |
V05n745:1720: deva saṃskāraparikṣayādeṣa jīrṇo vṛddha ityucyata iti |
V05n745:1726: punarapi puruṣaṃ paśyatyutpāṇḍotpāṇḍukaṃ sphuṭitaparuṣagātraṃ parvatomakukṣiṃ vraṇapūyotkīrṇairaṅgapratyaṅgāvadhāribhiḥ paṭṭakopanibaddhaiḥ dīrghadīrghaiḥ praśvasantandaṇḍamavaṣṭabhya khaṃjamānagatiṃ saṃprasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaramātyānāmaṃtrayate |
V05n745:1727: ka eṣa bhavantaḥ puruṣa utpāṇḍotpāṇḍukaḥ pūrvavadyāvat khaṃjamāno'bhisaṃprasthita iti |
V05n745:1733: deva sādhāraṇa eṣa eva dharmo duṣkṛtakarmakāriṇāṃ pūrvakarmāparādhādbhavatīti |
V05n745:1735: sarvathā pāpaṃ na kartavyamiti viditvā saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1737: nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śivikāmalaṃkṛtāṃ chatradhvajapatākāśaṃkhapaṭahastrīpuruṣadārakadārikābhirākīrṇāṃ caturbhiḥ puruṣairutkṣiptām ulkāṃ ca purastānnīyamānāṃ kāṣṭhavyagrahastaiḥ puruṣaiḥ pṛṣṭhato'nubaddhāṃ hā tāta hā bhrātaḥ hā pitaḥ hā svāminniti ca samantādārodanaśabdaṃ śrutvā ca punaramātyānāmaṃtrayate |
V05n745:1738: kimeṣā bhavantaḥ śivikā nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ pūrvavadyāvadārodanaśabda iti |
V05n745:1745: tato jīrṇāturamṛtasaṃdarśanāt saṃvignamanā evaṃrupābhogā parityaktavyā itipratinivṛtya śokāgāraṃ praviśyāvasthita iti |
V05n745:1746: tasya vijite velāmo nāma brāhmaṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vedavedāṃgapāragaḥ |
V05n745:1747: tena śrutaṃ yathā rādhā jīrṇāturamṛtasaṃdarśanādudvignaḥ śokāgāraṃ praviśyāvasthita iti |
V05n745:1748: śrutvā ca punaranekairbrāhmaṇaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvaśvetaṃ vaḍavārathamabhiruhya sauvarṇena daṇḍakamaṇḍalunā dhāryamāṇena yena rājā piṇḍavaṃśastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1752: brāhmaṇo velāmo jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā niṣaṇṇaḥ kathayati |
V05n745:1754: rājñā yathāvṛttaṃ sarvaṃ velāmāya brāhmaṇāya vistareṇārocitam |
V05n745:1758: santi sattvāḥ sukṛtakarmakāriṇaḥ santi duṣkṛtakarmakāriṇaḥ (santi cobhayakarmakāriṇaḥ) |
V05n745:1762: api tu deva yajña iṣṭavyaḥ svargasopānabhūta iti |
V05n745:1769: annamannārthibhyo dīyatāṃ pānaṃ pānārthibhyaḥ tatrācāmena parisravamāṇena gartaḥ kṛtaḥ |
V05n745:1772: tasyācāmena taṇḍulāmbunā ca dvādaśavārṣikeṇa saṃpūryamāṇasya vṛddhiḥ saṃvṛttā |
V05n745:1782: asminnevānanda pradeśe upoṣadho nāma rājā jātaḥ |
V05n745:1784: tenāsya nagarasya kumāravardhanaṃ kumāravardhanamiti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n745:1787: asminnānanda krauṃcāne upoṣadhasya rājño hastināgena krauṃcayatā śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ krauṃcānaṃ krauṃcānamiti saṃjñā saṃvṛtā |
V05n745:1802: asminnānanda suvarṇaprasthe bodhisattvena bahusuvarṇako yajño yaṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:1806: asyāmānanda sāketāyāmupoṣadho nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca |
V05n745:1807: tasyāpareṇa samayena mūrdhni piṭako jāto mṛduḥ sumṛduḥ tadyathā tūlapicurvā karpāsapicurvā na ca kiṃcidābādhaṃ janayati |
V05n745:1810: abhirupo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ pūrvavadyāvat sarvāṅgapratyaṃgopetaḥ |
V05n745:1811: mūrdhni jāto mūrdhni jāta iti mūrdhāto mūrdhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n745:1815: ekaikā kathayati māṃ dhāyatu māṃ dhāyatviti māndhātā māndhāteti ca saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n745:1817: māndhātuḥ kumārasya janapadagatasya upoṣadho rājā glānaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
V05n745:1824: tenājñā dattā kumāraṃ śabdayata rājyābhiṣekaṃ pratyanubhavatviti |
V05n745:1831: yadi mama pitā kālagataḥ kiṃ tatra gacchāmīti viditvā tatraivāvasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1846: māndhātuḥ kumārasya divaukaso nāma yakṣaḥ purojavaḥ |
V05n745:1848: ādhiṣṭhānikāśca cchatraṃ paṭṭa mukuṭaṃ cādāya svayamevāgatāḥ |
V05n745:1849: adhiṣṭhānaṃ svayamāgataṃ svayamāgatamiti sāketā sāketā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n745:1852: evaṃ bhadanta iti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
V05n745:1853: atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ caran prakrānto yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe brāhmaṇaśchinnabhaktako halaṃ vāhayati |
V05n745:1856: dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṃgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam |
V05n745:1858: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyāstaḥ śamathaścittasya kalpatāṃ janayati |
V05n745:1859: aputrasya vā putrapratilābho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathopacitakuśalamūlasya sattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam |
V05n745:1860: sa tāṃ peyāmādāya laghu laghveva yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:1862: iyaṃ bho gautama peyā iyamasti mamāmtike |
V05n745:1863: anukampaṃ piba etadbhagavan gautamaḥ peyām || 55 || iti |
V05n745:1864: tato bhagavatā tasya brāhmaṇasya kūpo darśitaḥ |
V05n745:1865: sa cette brāhmaṇa parityājyāḥ asmin jīrṇakūpe prakṣipa iti |
V05n745:1867: sa jīrṇakūpo vāspāyamānaḥ peyāpūrṇī yathāpi tadbuddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena |
V05n745:1873: tato'sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayābhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
V05n745:1874: tasya bhagavatāḥ āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmedeśanā kṛtā pūrvavadyāvadanādyakālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1876: eṣo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
V05n745:1877: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇagatamabhiprasannam |
V05n745:1878: athāsau brāhmaṇau vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasaṃpanna iva kārṣikaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandhānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikāt prakrānto yāvatkṣetraṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:1885: deva mayā yavāḥ prakīrṇāste sauvarṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
V05n745:1896: tathaiva rājā kutūhalajātaḥ svayameva gataḥ paśyati |
V05n745:1901: tatastena brāhmaṇena parituṣṭena yaddattaṃ te sauvarṇayavāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
V05n745:1902: tato bhagavānsaṃprasthito yāvadanyatamasminpradeśe paṃca kārṣikaśatānyutpāṇḍotpāṇḍukāni sphuṭitapāṇipādāni śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitāni lāṅgalāni bāhayanti |
V05n745:1903: te'pi valīvardā vraṇapūyotkīrṇaiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhurviśvasanto vahanti |
V05n745:1904: dadṛśuste kārṣikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ pūrvavadyāvadupacitakuśalamūlasya sattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam |
V05n745:1907: dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā ca punarvinayāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:1908: atha te kārṣikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
V05n745:1909: tato bhagavatā teṣā kārṣikāṇāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā pūrvavadyāvadanādyakālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajrena bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1910: te dṛṣṭasatyā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan |
V05n745:1911: labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ carema vayaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n745:1912: te bhagavatā ehi bhikṣukayā pravrājitāḥ pūrvavadyāvannaiva sthitā buddhamanorathena |
V05n745:1915: te valīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇicchittvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:1919: pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṃgāvatāre haṃsamatsyakūrmāṇāṃ yāvaddṛṣṭasatyāḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ |
V05n745:1920: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:1921: kiṃ bhadanta ebhiḥ kārṣikapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtaṃ yena kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttā bhagavataśca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1922: tairvalīvardapūrvakairdevaputraiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena valīvardeṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanṃ ca kṛtamiti |
V05n745:1924: ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām |
V05n745:1925: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'sminneva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loke udapādi |
V05n745:1926: pūrvavadyāvatsa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīmupaniśṛtya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve |
V05n745:1927: tasya śāsane etāni paṃca kārṣikaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan |
V05n745:1928: tatra ebhirna paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ na manasikāro vāhitaḥ kintu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenātināmitam |
V05n745:1929: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni etāni paṃca kārṣikaśatāni |
V05n745:1931: yadete kārṣikā yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vāhitaḥ kintu saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenātināmitaṃ tena karmaṇā paṃca janmaśatāṇi tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣikāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
V05n745:1933: yadebhiḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:1934: te'pi valīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasyaiva samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsaṃstatraiva kṣudrānukṣudrāṇi śikṣāpadāni svaṃḍitāni |
V05n745:1937: yatkāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ pratipālitaṃ tenedānīṃ devaputrabhūtaiḥ satyadarśanṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:1938: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:1945: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā cānuvyaṃjanairvirājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṃgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam |
V05n745:1949: ko'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāniḥ syānnāpi puṇyaparihāniriti |
V05n745:1956: kṣūṇa ānanda eṣa brāhmaṇaḥ (anenopakramyāsmin pradeśe abhivādane kṛte)
V05n745:1960: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet |
V05n745:1963: athāyuṣmānānando laghu laghveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:1965: evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati yacca kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena yaccaitarhi bhagavateti |
V05n745:1968: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya saṃyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭum |
V05n745:1969: etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātamupadarśayet |
V05n745:1972: paśyanti bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ |
V05n745:1981: śrutva ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdhamantaḥ-purakumārairamātyairbhaṭabalāgreṇa naigamajānapadaiśa saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:1982: evaṃ virūḍhako'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ uṣidattaḥ purāṇasthapatirviśākhā mṛgāramātā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni saṃprasthitāni kaiścitpūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni |
V05n745:1984: taiḥ śrutamantarhito'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta iti |
V05n745:1989: atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:1990: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:1991: yo buddhacairyeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān ||57 || iti |
V05n745:1996: atha bhagavāṃstasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:1997: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:2002: padāvihārasya ca mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ca iyatpuṇyam (uktaṃ) bhagavatā |
V05n745:2004: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2005: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇapeṭā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:2006: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitta āropayenmuktapuṣpasya rāśim ||59 || iti |
V05n745:2011: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2012: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:2013: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān ||60 || iti |
V05n745:2018: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2019: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:2020: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān ||61 ||iti |
V05n745:2025: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2026: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇarāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:2027: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān ||62 || iti |
V05n745:2030: padāvihārasya mṛtpiṇḍadānasya muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālāvihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ceyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā |
V05n745:2034: śataṃ sahasrāṇi suvarṇaparvatā meroḥ samā nāsya samā bhavanti |
V05n745:2036: eṣā hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate |
V05n745:2041: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2048: tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairmahān viśeṣo'dhigataḥ |
V05n745:2049: kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni kaiścitpratyekāyāṃ bodhau kaiścidanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
V05n745:2053: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā |
V05n745:2059: aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ bhagavān kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane asmākamevārāme iti |
V05n745:2061: upasaṃkranya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:2062: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavāndharmmayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n745:2064: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti |
V05n745:2065: pūrvavat śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya kālyamevotthāyāsanakāni prajñapyodakamaṇīnpratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati |
V05n745:2066: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti |
V05n745:2068: na tāvadbhoḥ puruṣānyatīrthyakānāṃ praveśo deyo yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena na bhuktam |
V05n745:2072: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ pūrvavadyāvaddhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
V05n745:2080: tatraiva piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca paryupāsiṣye iti |
V05n745:2086: mā tāvattīrthyānāṃ pradeśaṃ dāsyasi yāvad buddhamukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktam |
V05n745:2088: āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhā ye māṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya iti na jānate |
V05n745:2089: gacchāmi kṛpaṇajanasyānukampāṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:2092: yāvadanyatarā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhibhūtā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣāmaṭati |
V05n745:2095: tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭhaḥ kāyaprasādikaścittaprāsādikaśca śānteneryāpathena |
V05n745:2097: nunaṃ mayaivaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā yena me iyaṃ samavasthā |
V05n745:2100: tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam |
V05n745:2101: yadi te bhagini pratityaktaṃ taddiyatāmasminpātre iti |
V05n745:2108: āyuṣyatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya tasyā eva samakṣamanyatamaṃ kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya paribhuktam |
V05n745:2110: kiṃ cāpyāryeṇa mama cittānurakṣaṇayā paribhuktaṃ nānenāhāreṇāhārakṛtyaṃ kariṣyatīti |
V05n745:2114: mamāryena mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratipāditaḥ pragṛhīta iti āyuṣmati mahākāśyape cittamabhiprasādya kālagatā |
V05n745:2116: sā śakreṇa devendreṇadṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī kālaṃ ca kurvāṇā no tu dṛṣṭā kutropapannā iti |
V05n745:2117: (sa) narakān vyavalokayitumārabdhe na paśyati tiraścaḥ pretānmanuṣyāṃśca cāturmahārājikān devān trayastriṃśānna paśyati |
V05n745:2127: ime tāvanmanuṣyāḥ puṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśyeva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:2128: tasmāddānāni vā dadāmi puṇyāni vā karomi |
V05n745:2130: yattvahamenaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayeyamiti viditvā kṛpaṇavīthyāṃ gṛhaṃ nirmitavān |
V05n745:2131: cīracīracīvarakaṃ kākābhinilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānamabhinirmāya uddhūtaśiraskaḥ śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitaḥ sphuṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ vayitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:2135: duḥkhitako'yamiti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāritam |
V05n745:2136: śakreṇa devendreṇa divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātraṃ pūritam |
V05n745:2143: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛtto yāvat paśyati śakraṃ devendram |
V05n745:2149: ime tāvanmanuṣyā apratyakṣadarśinaḥ puṇyānāṃ dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti |
V05n745:2154: kṛtapuṇyā hi modante āsmiṃlloke paratra ca ||71 || iti |
V05n745:2155: tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ praveṣṭumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:2156: atha śakro devendra ākāśastha evāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātraṃ pūrayati |
V05n745:2157: āyuṣmānapi mahākāśyapaḥ pātramavāṅmukhaṃ karotyannaṃ pānaṃ choryate |
V05n745:2162: amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapaḥ ācāmena pratipāditaḥ |
V05n745:2166: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:2167: sa ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalaṃ bhagavāndharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati |
V05n745:2169: atha rājā prasenajit kosalaḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:2170: adhivāsayatu me bhagavānāryo mahākāśyapamuddiśya bhaktaṃ saptāheneti |
V05n745:2172: atha rājā prasenajitkosalo bhagavatastūṣṇīṃ bhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:2173: atha rājā prasenajitkosalastāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya kālyamevotthāyāsanakāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati |
V05n745:2176: ayaṃ rājā pratyakṣadaśyeṃva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratiṣṭhito'tṛptaṃ eva puṇyairdānāni dadāti puṇyāni karoti |
V05n745:2177: atha rājā prasenajitkosalo'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ śucinā praṇīṃtena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
V05n745:2183: ko'nyo mamāntikātprabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati |
V05n745:2184: bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya bhagavān nāmnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatviti |
V05n745:2185: tato bhagavatā koṭṭamallakasya nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā |
V05n745:2187: ṣaṣṭhe divase rājā kare kaṃpolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:2188: mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃkte koṭṭamallasya nāmnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti |
V05n745:2191: kimarthaṃ deva kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti |
V05n745:2194: yatredānīṃ bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṃkte koṭṭamallasya nāmnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti |
V05n745:2197: vayaṃ tathā kāriṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavāndevasyaiva nāmnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti tena pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā |
V05n745:2198: śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇītatara āhāraḥ kartavyaḥ prabhūtaśca |
V05n745:2204: tataḥ koṭṭamallakāḥ pradhāvitā bhūmaunipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti |
V05n745:2212: na śaktaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayituṃ yathā pūrvam |
V05n745:2213: tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama bhagavān nāmnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva pradiṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:2214: tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasya nāmnā evaṃ dakṣiṇādiṣṭā |
V05n745:2216: balaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāsapiṇḍikāyāḥ ||72 || iti |
V05n745:2218: bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā |
V05n745:2221: icchasi tvamānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitkosalasyālavaṇīkāṃ kulmāsapiṇḍikāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum |
V05n745:2222: etasya bhagavan kālaḥ etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāsapiṇḍikāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet |
V05n745:2227: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
V05n745:2228: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ |
V05n745:2248: gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dvārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmīti |
V05n745:2249: sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ nivedayati |
V05n745:2259: putrasya vistareṇa yad gṛhapaltnyābhihitaṃ tatsarvamākhyāya kathayati |
V05n745:2260: iyaṃ mayā ātmīyā alavaṇikā kulmāsapiṇḍikā ānītā |
V05n745:2265: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hītadīnānukaṃpakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
V05n745:2270: nūnaṃ mayaivaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā |
V05n745:2273: tataḥ pratyekabuddhastasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittamājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān |
V05n745:2275: tatastībreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇīkā kulmāsapiṇḍikā pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā |
V05n745:2276: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣave yo'sau daridrapuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajitkosalastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:2278: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu rājaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritavān |
V05n745:2279: ṣaṭkṛtvo'syāmeva śrāvastyāṃ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇa |
V05n745:2284: balaṃ hi rukṣikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāsapiṇḍikāyāḥ || 73 || iti |
V05n745:2286: bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kosalasyālavaṇikā kulmāsapiṇḍikāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛteti rājñā prasenajitkosalena śrutam |
V05n745:2288: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:2289: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kosalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n745:2290: atha rājā prasenajitkosalaṃ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocata |
V05n745:2293: tato rājā prasenajitā kosalena buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsīṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam |
V05n745:2295: tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samupānīya dīpamālāmabhyudyato dātum |
V05n745:2296: tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahākolāhalo jātaḥ |
V05n745:2298: tayā khaṇḍamallakena bhikṣamaṭantyā sa uccaśabdo mahāśabdaḥ śrutaḥ |
V05n745:2302: rājñā prasenajitā kosalena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghastraimāsīṃ tailakumbhakoṭiṃ ca samupānīya dīpamālāmabhyudyato dātumiti |
V05n745:2304: ayaṃ rājā prasenajitkosalaḥ puṇyairatṛptaḥ adyatvena dānāni dadāti puṇyāni karoti |
V05n745:2305: yattvahamapi kutaścitsamupānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti tayā khaṃḍamallakena tailasya stokaṃ yācitvā pradīpaḥ prajvālya bhagavataścaṃkrame dattaḥ |
V05n745:2307: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavān śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śāstā loke utpannaḥ evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam |
V05n745:2308: yathā cāsya śāriputramaudgalyāyanāvagrayugaṃ bhadrayugamānando bhikṣurupasthāyikaḥ śuddhodanaḥ pitā mahāmāyā mātā kapilavastu nagaraṃ rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ evaṃ mamāpi śāriputragaudgalyāyanāvagrayugaṃ bhadrayugaṃ syādānando bhikṣurupasthāyikaḥ śuddhodanaḥ pitā mātā mahāmāyā kapilavastu nagaraṃ rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ |
V05n745:2309: yathā cāyaṃ bhagavāndhātuvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāsyati evamahamapi dhātuvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā parinirvāpayeyamiti |
V05n745:2310: yāvatsarve te dīpāḥ parinirvāṇāḥ sa tayā prajvālito dīpo jvalatyeva |
V05n745:2311: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ na tāvadupasthā (pakaḥ pratisaṃlīyati)
V05n745:2314: asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ ālokaśayyāṃ kalpayiṣyanti yattvahaṃ pradīpaṃ nirvāpayeyamiti |
V05n745:2315: sa hastena nirvāpayitumārabdho na śaknoti tata (ścīvarakarṇikena)
V05n745:2319: yado vairaṃbhā api vāyavo vāyeyuste'pi na śaknuyurnirvāpayituṃ prāgeva hastacīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā |
V05n745:2320: tathāhyayaṃ pradīpastayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa prajvālitaḥ |
V05n745:2321: apitvānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā varsaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhatsamyaksaṃbuddhaḥ |
V05n745:2322: śāriputramaudgalyāyanau tasyāgrayugaṃ bhadrayugamānando bhikṣurupasthāyikaḥ śuddhodanaḥ pitā mātā mahāmāyā kapilavastu nagaraṃ rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ putraḥ |
V05n745:2331: tato bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā bhagavantamidamavocat mayā ca bhadanta bhagavānāryamahākāśyapasya pūjādhikāreṇa bhaktasaptāhenopanimaṃtritaḥ |
V05n745:2332: tasya mama bhagavatā alavaṇikāṃ kulmāsapiṃḍikāmārabhya pūrvikā karmaplotirvyākṛtā |
V05n745:2334: ekaikaśca bhikṣuḥ śatasahasreṇa mūlyena vastrayugenācchāditastailakumbhakoṭiṃ ca samupānīya pradīpamālā dattā |
V05n745:2340: gambhīrāvabhāsā durdṛsā duravabodhā atarkyā atarkyāvacarā sūkṣmā nipuṇā paṇḍitavijñavedanīyā |
V05n745:2341: sā na sukarā tvayaikena dānena samupānetuṃ na dānaśatena na dānasahasreṇa na dānaśatasahasreṇāpi tu mahārāja tvayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhiprārthayitā dātuvyānyeva dānāni kartavyānyeva puṇyāṇi sevitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi bhajitavyāni paryupāsitavyāni |
V05n745:2342: evaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi kadācillokajyeṣṭho vināyaka iti |
V05n745:2343: evamukto rājā prasenajit kosalaḥ prārodīdaśrūṇi varṣayan |
V05n745:2345: anuttarāṃ bhadanta bhagavatā samyaksaṃbodhi prārthayitā kiyanti dānāni dattāni puṇyāni vā kṛtānīti bhagavāṇāha |
V05n745:2347: yanmayāsminneva bhadrake kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni cānekaprakārāṇi kṛtāni tacchṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuruta bhāṣiṣye |
V05n745:2348: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārājāmitāyuṣi prajāyāmupoṣadho nāma rājā babhūva |
V05n745:2350: mṛdhuḥ samṛdustadyathā tūlapicurbā karpāsapicurvā paripākatvāt sphuṭitaḥ |
V05n745:2352: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirā pralambavāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabhrustuṅganāso dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraḥ |
V05n745:2354: upośadhasya rājño'śītiḥ strīsahasrāṇi kumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā prasrutāni |
V05n745:2355: ekaikā strī kathayati māndhāya māndhāya iti |
V05n745:2358: mūrdhnā jātastasmādbhavatu kumārasya mūrdhāt iti nāma |
V05n745:2361: māndhātuḥ kumārasya kumārakrīḍāyāṃ krīḍataḥ ṣaṭ śakrāścyutāḥ |
V05n745:2362: evaṃ yauvarājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaḍ mahārājyaṃ kārayataḥ ṣaḍ jāmbūdvīpakān janapadān samanuśāsataḥ ṣaṭ |
V05n745:2365: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyāṃ durmukho nāma ṛṣiḥ paṃcābhijñaḥ |
V05n745:2375: ayaṃ rājā caturdvīpeśvaraḥ kka mayā gantavyamiti |
V05n745:2381: evaṃ vinatake'śvakarṇe sudarśane khadirake īṣādhāre yugandhare ca |
V05n745:2385: tataḥ sumerumūrdhanyabhirohatā tena ṛṣiṇā bhaṭabalāgraṃ stambhitam divaukaso yakṣaḥ purojavo dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2387: māndhātā nṛpatirhyevaṃ naite vaiśālakā vakāḥ || 75 || iti |
V05n745:2404: tathā nandopanandp nāgarājo māndhātṛbalaṃ dṛṣṭvā asurā hyete iti caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ |
V05n745:2407: sarve ca nandopanandādayo bhagnā yena cāturmahārājikā devāstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:2409: yat khalu mārṣā jānīdhvaṃ mahāsainyaṃ pratyupasthitam |
V05n745:2414: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ māndhātā rājā cakravartī śakraṃ devendraṃ darśanāya gacchati |
V05n745:2417: kintu arghaṃ pādyaṃ ca gṛhītvā pratyudgantavyamiti |
V05n745:2418: tataścāturmahārājikā devā arghaṃ pādyaṃ ca gṛhītvācchatradhvajapatākābhirvividhaiśca vādyaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ |
V05n745:2419: tato rājā māndhātā cāturmahārājikān devān pratisaṃmodya devaiḥ parivṛto devāṃstrayastriṃśān gataḥ |
V05n745:2423: yat khalu kauśika jānīyā asurāḥ pañca gulmakān bhaṅktā pratyupasthitāḥ |
V05n745:2424: yatte kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti |
V05n745:2429: tato rājā māndhātā aṣṭādaśabhirbhaṭabalāgrakoṭībhirupari vihāyasamabhyudgamya guṇāsphālanaṃ kṛtavān |
V05n745:2430: asurā aṣṭādaśabhaṭabalāgrakoṭīrdṛṣṭvā ativibhīṣaṇaṃ ca śabdaṃ karṇaupidhāya niṣpalāyitāḥ |
V05n745:2432: asti me jambudvīpe dvīpaḥ sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca pūrvavidehaḥ avaragodānīyaḥ uttarakuruśca |
V05n745:2433: yattvahaṃ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyamiti |
V05n745:2434: sahacittotpādādrājā māndhātā tasya ṛddhe parihīne jambudvīpamāgatya kharamābādhitaṃ praveditavān gāthāṃ ca bhāṣate |
V05n745:2441: yaḥ prekṣate duḥkhamito nidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ rameta |
V05n745:2442: loke hi śalyamupadhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣate ||78 ||
V05n745:2448: kṛtapuṇyā hi modante loke'smiṃśca paratra ca ||80 || iti ||
V05n745:2450: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo'sau rājā māndhātā ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:2451: yanmayā itthaṃ sattvahitaṃ kṛtaṃ tena nānuttaraṃ jñānamadhigatam |
V05n745:2453: punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā sarvahitaṃ kṛtaṃ tacchrūyatām |
V05n745:2454: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja mahāsudarśano nāma rājābhūt cakravartī saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataśca tasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhiriddhibhiḥ |
V05n745:2456: atha mahāsudarśano rājā dharmaprāsāde pañca pratyeka buddhaśatāni bhojayitvā pratyekaṃ ca dūṣyayugenācchādayitvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2457: labdhvā hi vipulaṃ bhogaṃ na pramādyodvicakṣaṇaḥ |
V05n745:2459: evaṃ dattvehaṃ medhānī śrāddho muktena cetasāḥ |
V05n745:2461: syāt khalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsudarśano nāma rājā cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataścatasṛbhiśca mānuṣīkābhiriddhibhiriti na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
V05n745:2462: api tvahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena mahāsudarśano nāma rājā cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataścatasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhiriddhibhiḥ |
V05n745:2463: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiridhigatā iti na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam |
V05n745:2464: api tu taddānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam |
V05n745:2465: punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayatā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni ca kṛtāni tacchrūyatāṃ |
V05n745:2467: sa idamevaṃrūpaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dānamadāccaturaśītināgasahasrāṇāṃ suvarṇālaṃkārāṇāṃ suvarṇadhvajānāṃ hemajālapraticcannānām
V05n745:2469: sa evaṃ dānāni dattvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2470: dānaṃ dattvā sukhī hi syāddāna dattvā viśāradaḥ |
V05n745:2471: dānena pūjyate sādhu deveṣu manujeṣu ca || 83 ||
V05n745:2474: syāt khalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena belāmo nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo'bhūt |
V05n745:2476: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena belāmo nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo'bhūvam |
V05n745:2478: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhi (radhi)
V05n745:2480: api tu taddānamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam |
V05n745:2481: punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayatā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni ca kṛtāni tacchrūyatām |
V05n745:2482: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja śakuno nāma rājābhūt cakravartī caturdvīpeścaraḥ saptatiratnaiḥ samanvāgataścatasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhiriddhvibhiḥ |
V05n745:2484: tasya rājño na putro na duhitā |
V05n745:2485: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:2486: īdṛśe mama bhogaiśvarye na putro na dudhitā |
V05n745:2488: sa śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭaḥ sa kathayati |
V05n745:2489: mārṣa kasmāttvaṃ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparastiṣṭhasi |
V05n745:2491: kauśika īdṛśo mama mahābhogaiśvarye na putro na duhitā |
V05n745:2497: śakreṇa gandhamādanāt parvatādoṣadhirādāya tasya rājñaḥ preṣitā |
V05n745:2517: tā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtāḥ sarvāsāṃ putrā jātāḥ |
V05n745:2520: tasya vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kuśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam |
V05n745:2527: te āgatya caturaṃgabalakāyena tasya nagaraṃ veṣṭayitvāvasthitāḥ |
V05n745:2528: rājā mahāśakunirna śaknoti taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayitum |
V05n745:2532: eṣa tava pitā koṭṭarājabhiḥ sārdhaṃ na śaknoti saṃgrāmayitum |
V05n745:2537: sa eṣa tava kiṃ rathaṃ dāsyati |
V05n745:2550: ko'yaṃ kuśaḥ kumāro bhadrakalpīyo bodhisattvaḥ khedamāpatsyate |
V05n745:2556: yadi cakraṃ gadāṃ kṣipanti tadrasātalaṃ praviśati |
V05n745:2574: yāvanmahāśakunirājñānyasya putrasyārthe vyājāntareṇa sā dārikā kuśasyānupradattā |
V05n745:2575: nakṣatradivasamuhūrtadivasaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kuśaḥ kumāro niveśitaḥ |
V05n745:2583: ka eṣa piśācaḥ kumārāṇāṃ madhye krīḍati |
V05n745:2585: bhūyo'pi tayā kumāraiḥ sārdhaṃ jalakrīḍanayā krīḍan dṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:2589: tayā pradīpaṃ prajvālya kūḍṇīrakeṇa pracchādya sthāpitaḥ |
V05n745:2594: sā kathayati piśācaḥ piśāca iti kṛtvā niṣpalāyitā |
V05n745:2601: kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣā na santi yāhaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ piśācasyānupradattā |
V05n745:2615: yāvadanyatamāsminkarvaṭake siṃhabhayena mahājanakāyā dvārāṇi baddhvā diśo'ṇuvyavalokayantastiṣṭhanti |
V05n745:2623: kuśena kumāreṇa siṃhasamīpaṃ gatvā śaṃkhaḥ āpūritaḥ |
V05n745:2632: tasya yasminkarvaṭake sā patnī taṃ ca karvaṭakaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:2686: tadā śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ piśācaḥ piśāca iti |
V05n745:2692: sā rājaduhitā yena labdhapūrvā tena śrutam |
V05n745:2693: yā sā mama rājaduhitā labdhapūrvā sā kuśaṃ kumāraṃ parityajya svagṛhaṃ gatā |
V05n745:2694: tena tasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭam yadi tāvanme dārikāmanuprayacchasīti evaṃ kuśalam |
