V05n745:2697: eṣā mamā duhitā rājño mahāśakuneḥ putrasya kuśasya kumārasya pradattikā |
V05n745:2699: sa caturaṅgena balakāyenāgatya tasya rājadhānīṃ veṣṭayitvāvasthitaḥ |
V05n745:2700: sa rājā tena sārdhaṃ na śaknoti saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayitum |
V05n745:2706: yadi mama rājā duhitaramanuprayaccati ahaṃ tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayiṣye |
V05n745:2717: tatra vayaṃ kālajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kuśaḥ kumāraḥ paṃcaśatike dvau tūṇau baddhvā śaṃkhacakragadāṃ ca gṛhītvā nirgataḥ |
V05n745:2730: tena tasya caturaṃgo balakāyo'nupradatto mahatā satkāreṇa sānupreṣitā |
V05n745:2737: yena caturaṃgo balakāya ūḍhastatra nātidūre eḍhakāścaranti |
V05n745:2749: ata eva iyaṃ rājaduhitā mamāntike aprasādaṃ pravedayati |
V05n745:2757: kumāra mā khedamāpatsyase mā ātmānaṃ praghātaya |
V05n745:2758: imaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śirasi dhāraya pūrṇamanoratho bhaviṣyasi |
V05n745:2775: tena sā purī catūratnamayīṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpitā |
V05n745:2776: kuśena kumāreṇa vāsitamiti kuśāvatī kuśāvatīti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
V05n745:2778: kuśo nāma balacakravartī teṣu ṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yaġyavāṭāni māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi brāhmaṇebhyo dānamadāt |
V05n745:2779: sa ātmano yajñasaṃpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2781: ko dānaṃ na prayaccheta saṃprattiryena labhyate || 86 ||
V05n745:2783: dadāti dānaṃ paralokabhīruḥ śūreṣvasau śūrataro mato me ||87 ||
V05n745:2784: na taṃ hi śūraṃ munayo badanti yaḥ śastrapāṇirvicaratyanīke |
V05n745:2785: dānaṃ prayacchanti viśāradā ye śūrāṃstu tānsarvavido vadanti ||88 ||
V05n745:2786: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena kuśo nāma rājā babhūva balacakravartī yena tatṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni |
V05n745:2788: api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena kuśo nāma rājābhūvaṃ balacakravartī |
V05n745:2789: mayaiva tatṣaṣṭiṣū nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā dānāni dattāni puṇyāṇi kṛtāni |
V05n745:2790: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgena vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti |
V05n745:2792: api tvabhūnme taddānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ vā saṃbhāramātrakaṃ vā |
V05n745:2794: kiṃ bhadanta kuśena rājñā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākenāṣṭādaśabhiravalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ |
V05n745:2796: kuśenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitāni avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
V05n745:2797: kuśenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni ko'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati |
V05n745:2798: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau |
V05n745:2799: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
V05n745:2801: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ caphalanti khalu dehinām ||89 ||
V05n745:2804: asati buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukaṃpakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
V05n745:2810: tena gṛhapatinā svayamevotthāya gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ uktaśca |
V05n745:2813: mā haivāyaṃ tapyeta atyantakṣataścopahataśceti viditvopari vihāyasamiti vistaraḥ |
V05n745:2814: yāvattena satkṛto yāvatpādayornipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdha yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ nāhamasya karmaṇo bhāgī syām |
V05n745:2815: yattu kārāḥ kṛtā anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeya |
V05n745:2816: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau gṛhapatireṣa evāsau kuśaḥ |
V05n745:2817: yadanena pratyekabuddhasyantike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāṣṭādaśabhiravalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ siṃhavaktākṛtimukhaśca saṃvṛttaḥ |
V05n745:2818: yattu kārāḥ kṛtāstasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā saṃvṛtto balacakravartī |
V05n745:2819: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ |
V05n745:2823: ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:2824: punarapi mahārāja yanmayānuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhiṃ prārthayatā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni ca kṛtāni tacchrūyatām |
V05n745:2827: tasya viṣaye yadā durbhikṣaṃ bhavati tadā satyopayācanena devo varṣati |
V05n745:2831: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphīṭaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca |
V05n745:2833: tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam |
V05n745:2838: tataḥ sa janakāyo durbhikṣakālamṛtyubhayabhītaḥ saṃjalpaṃ kurtumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:2839: bhavanto rājñā evaṃ vijite'yaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam |
V05n745:2843: tato yeṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikaṃ bhaktaṃ nāsti te mataṃgaviṣayaṃ gatāḥ |
V05n745:2845: tena tasya janakāyasya dvādaśavarṣāṇyannapānena yogodvahanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:2850: deva kaliṃgaviṣaye triśaṃkurnāma mataṅgarājo maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā sarvasattvahitavatsalaḥ |
V05n745:2857: deva śrūyate yo'sau mataṅgaviṣaye rājā ṛṣṭiṣu pravrajituḥ so'dhyeṣitavya iti |
V05n745:2858: tato rājā brahmadatto mataṅgaviṣayaṃ gatvā tamṛṣimadhyeṣitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:2872: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṃkurnāma mataṅgarājo'bhūt maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasattvahitānukampī yasya satyopayācanena devo vṛṣṭaḥ durbhikṣaṃ nivṛttaṃ subhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtamiti |
V05n745:2874: api tvahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṃkurnāma mataṅgarājo babhūva maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasattvahitānukaṃpī yasya satyopayācanena devo vṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:2875: syāt khalu te mahārāja mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgena vā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiradhigatā |
V05n745:2877: api tvabhūttaddānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau hetumātrakaṃ vā saṃbhāramātrakaṃ vā |
V05n745:2878: punarapi mahārājayanmayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni tacchrūyatām |
V05n745:2879: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja mithilāyāṃ mahādevo nāma rājābhūccakravartī |
V05n745:2881: sa ātmano yajñasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate ca |
V05n745:2884: loke saṃpūjyate dātā dātā deveṣu pūjyate |
V05n745:2885: śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ vā phaladrumaḥ ||94 || iti |
V05n745:2886: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahādevo nāma rājā cakravartī yena taṃ niyataṃ kalyāṇaṃ dharmaṃ pravartitam |
V05n745:2887: yanniyataṃ kalyāṇaṃ vartma pravṛttamāgamya caturaśītirmahādevasahasrāṇi rājarṣayo brahmacaryamacārṣuriti |
V05n745:2889: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena mahādevo nāma rājābhūvaṃ cakravartī |
V05n745:2891: yanniyataṃ kalyāṇaṃ vartma pravṛttamāgamya caturaśītirmahādevasahasrāṇi rājarṣayo brahmacaryamacārṣuḥ |
V05n745:2892: syāta khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgena vā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiradhigateti |
V05n745:2895: punaraparaṃ mahārāja yanmayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhiprārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni tacchrūyatāṃ |
V05n745:2896: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja asyāmeva mithilāyāṃ teṣāmapaścimako nimirnāma rājābhūccakravartī |
V05n745:2901: ye prabhādyanti manujāḥ śocyāste puruṣādhamāḥ ||95 || iti |
V05n745:2903: vasa nime ramasva ihaiva pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samanvitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍa rama paricārayeti |
V05n745:2905: yathā yācitakaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ tāvatkālaṃ ratho yathā |
V05n745:2907: yato'haṃ mithilāṃ gatvā kariṣye kuśalaṃ bahu |
V05n745:2908: āgāmiṣye tataḥ svargaṃ kṛtapuṇyaḥ kṛtodayaḥ ||97 || iti |
V05n745:2909: sa mithilāmāgatya dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛttvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:2912: dānaṃ dattvā ca durbhikṣe tarpayitvā ca sajjanān |
V05n745:2916: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena nimirnāma rājābhūccakravartī yo devāṃstrayastriṃśān gataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇārdhāsanenopanimantrito divyaiśca pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samanvitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍitavān |
V05n745:2918: ) ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:2919: mayaiva tāni mithilāmāgatya caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni |
V05n745:2920: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgena vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiradhigateti |
V05n745:2924: vistareṇa yāvattasyaiko dvau yāvatpañca putrā jātāḥ |
V05n745:2925: yo sau tasya paścimakaḥ putrastasyādarśaprakhyaṃ mukham |
V05n745:2928: ādarśamukhaḥ kumāraḥ surataḥ sudāntaḥ tadanye te caṇḍā rabhasā karkaśāḥ |
V05n745:2929: sarve te piturarthakaraṇe niṣaṇṇā na kiñcitprajñayā pratividhyanti |
V05n745:2930: ādarśamukhaḥ kumāro gambhīra gambhīrān praśnān svaprajñayā nitīrayati |
V05n745:2934: sa cedahaṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ bhrātṛṇāmanyatamānyatamaṃ rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi ete caṇḍā rabhasāḥ karkaśā janapadānanayena vyasanamāpādayiṣyanti |
V05n745:2935: sacedādarśamukhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi jñātīnāṃ garhyo bhaviṣyāmi |
V05n745:2936: kathamidānīmayaṃ rājā jyeṣṭhaputrānapāsya kanīyāṃsaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayatīti |
V05n745:2942: mukuṭaṃ ca mūrdhni upanibaddhaṃ niścalaṃ bhavati |
V05n745:2947: yasya sarvāṇyetāni samābhavanti sa yuṣmābhirmamātyayādrājye pratiṣṭhāpayitavya ityuktvā 'sarvakṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayā' iti yāvat kālagataḥ |
V05n745:2956: ādarśamukhasya kumārasya maṇipādukāyugaṃ samarpitam samaṃ sthitam |
V05n745:2961: asyāpi ṣaṭ prajñāprativedanīyāni jñātavyāni antarnidhirbahirnidhirantarbahirnidhirvṛkṣāgre nidhiḥ parvatāgre nidhirudakānte nidhiḥ |
V05n745:2968: antarbahirnidhirdehalyā madhye nidhiḥ vṛkṣāgre nidhiriti kim |
V05n745:2970: tasya rājñaḥ saṃsthānavṛkṣastasya madhyāhe yatra chāyā sphuritvā tiṣṭhati tatra nidhiḥ |
V05n745:2972: tasya rājñaḥ krīḍāpuskariṇī tatra snānaśilā tasyādhastānnidhiḥ |
V05n745:2979: anyatamasmin karvaṭake daṇḍī nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati |
V05n745:2980: tena gṛhapatisakāśādvalīvardān yācitvā divā vāhayitvā tān balīvardānādāya tasya gṛhapaterniveśanaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:2989: gṛhaṃ praveśitāḥ tvayā mama valīvardā hāritāḥ |
V05n745:2992: sa kathayati ayamādarśamukho rājā prājñastasya sakāśaṃ gacchāvaḥ |
V05n745:2993: sa etamarthaṃ nitīrayitvā asmākaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ vakṣyati |
V05n745:2996: tena daṇḍī ucyate dhāraya me etāṃ vaḍavām |
V05n745:2999: tena pāṣāṇaṃ gṛhītvā śirasi prahāro dattaḥ |
V05n745:3033: sa tayā dārako vastreṇa pracchādya śāyāpitako'bhūt |
V05n745:3066: nāhaṃ gacchāmi ete māṃ nayanti ādarśamukhasakāśam |
V05n745:3083: anyasmin pradeśe ahinakulau parasparaviruddhau kaliṃ kurvataḥ |
V05n745:3085: āvāṃ divānyonyaṃ kaliṃ kurvāṇau dhṛtiṃ na labhāvaḥ |
V05n745:3089: yadāhaṃ paitṛke gṛhe tiṣṭhāmi tadāhaṃ śvaśuragṛhasyārthe utkaṇṭhāmi |
V05n745:3090: yadā śvasuragṛhe tiṣṭhāmi tadā paitṛkagṛhe utkaṇṭhāmi |
V05n745:3094: upasaṃkramya daṇḍī rājānaṃ jayenāyuṣā cā varśavitvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
V05n745:3107: asya daṇḍīno hihvāṃ chindata yena nārocitam |
V05n745:3108: asyāpi netroddharaṇaṃ kuruta yena valīvardā nopanibaddhāḥ |
V05n745:3110: ekadā me valīvardā hṛtā aparaṃ netroddharaṇaṃ kriyate |
V05n745:3113: deva anena daṇḍinā mama vaḍavā praghātitā |
V05n745:3116: asya puruṣasya jihvāṃ chindata yenoktaṃ yathā śaknoti tathā vārayeti |
V05n745:3117: asyāpi daṇḍino hastau ardhāpayata yenānyena śakyaṃ tāṃ dhārayituṃ nānyatra śilāprahārayā |
V05n745:3119: ekadā me vaḍavā praghātitā dvitīyaṃ ye jihvācchedaḥ |
V05n745:3123: gaccha eṣa eva te bhartā bhavatu |
V05n745:3125: ekadā anena mama bhartā praghātito'para eṣa me svāmī bhaviṣyati |
V05n745:3129: asya takṣāṇasya jihvāṃ chindata yo vāsīṃ muktvidakamadhye vācaṃ niścārayati |
V05n745:3130: asyāpi daṇḍino netroddharaṇaṃ kuruta paśyannapi gambhīramudakaṃ takṣāṇaṃ pṛcchati |
V05n745:3132: ekadā me vāsyapahṛtā dvitīyo me jihvācchedaḥ |
V05n745:3136: asyāḥ kalapālyā hastāvardhāpayata yadanayā dārakaḥ sarveṇa sarve pracchādya śāyayitaḥ |
V05n745:3137: daṇḍino'pi netroddharaṇaṃ kuruta yo'pratyavekṣya parakīye āsane niṣetsyati |
V05n745:3139: ekadā me putraḥ praghātito dvitīyo me hastacchedaḥ |
V05n745:3153: atra vṛkṣasyopariṣṭāmadhubindyā nipataṃtyā tṛṇaśādvalāni madhurīkṛtāni tāni tvayā bhakṣitāni |
V05n745:3159: yatra sa tittiri tittiri vāśitaṃ karoti sa pradeśo niṣkāṃcanaḥ |
V05n745:3171: tena yūyametat svāpateyaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇaṇebhyo dattvā tasmāt sthānādapakramata |
V05n745:3184: sā tvaṃ yadā śvaśuragṛhe tiṣṭhasi tadā sapremakasyārthe utkaṇṭhayasi |
V05n745:3185: yadā paitṛkagṛhe tiṣṭhasi tadā svāmino'rthe utkaṇṭhayasi |
V05n745:3186: sā tvameka sthānaṃ parityajyaṃ ekaṃ sugṛhītaṃ kuru |
V05n745:3189: ahinakulau daṇḍinaḥ svāpateyamanupradattaḥ kākenāpi avaśiṣṭā yathānuśiṣṭāḥ pratipannāḥ |
V05n745:3192: rājñā āttamanasā caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpitā |
V05n745:3195: tena dvādaśavārṣike durbhikṣe vartamāne anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:3196: sa ātmano yajñasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:3197: dhanaṃ hi labdhā dharmeṇa na kuryātsaṃcayaṃ budhaḥ |
V05n745:3201: evaṃ jñātvā tu medhāvī śrāddho muktena cetasā |
V05n745:3203: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenādarśamukho nāma rājā prābhāvyaḥ |
V05n745:3204: yena taddvādaśavārṣike durbhikṣe vartamāne anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:3206: api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayenādarśamukho nāma rājābhūvaṃ prābhāvyaḥ |
V05n745:3207: mayaiva dvādaśavārṣike durbhikṣe varttamāne anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:3208: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dāvasaṃvibhāgena vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti |
V05n745:3210: api tu me taddānaṃ hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ sambhāramātrakam |
V05n745:3211: punarapi mahārāja yanmayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni tacchrūyatāṃ |
V05n745:3213: tena caturaśītiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni |
V05n745:3214: sa ātmano yajñasampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
V05n745:3216: na prayaccheddhi ko dānaṃ saṃpattiryena labhyate ||104 ||
V05n745:3217: pratyūhya yo'yaṃ śatāni puṃsāṃ mātsaryamākramya sapatnabhūtam |
V05n745:3218: dadāti dānaṃ paralokabhīruḥ śūreṣvasau śūrataro mato me ||105 ||
V05n745:3219: na taṃ hi śūraṃ munayo vadanti yaḥ śastrapāṇirvicaratyanīke |
V05n745:3220: dānaṃ prayacchanti viśāradā ye śūrāṃstu tānsarvavido vadanti ||106 ||
V05n745:3221: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūccakravartī yena taccaturaśītiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭaṃ māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni |
V05n745:3223: api tu taddānaṃ saṃbodherhetumātrakaṃ pratyayapātrakaṃ sambhāramātrakam |
V05n745:3224: punarapi mahārāja yanmayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayitā dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni vīryapāramitā ca paripūritā na cānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiradhigateti tacchrūyatām |
V05n745:3225: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja paṃcālaviṣaye dvau rājānau babhūvatuḥ |
V05n745:3227: tatrottarapaṃcālo dhano nāmnā hastināpure nagare rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca |
V05n745:3230: tasmiṃśca nagare mahān hrada utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchanno haṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhito ramaṇīyaḥ |
V05n745:3231: tatra hrade janmacitro nāma nāgapotaḥ prativasati |
V05n745:3232: sa kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhārāmanuprayacchatīti atīva śasyāsaṃpattirbhavati |
V05n745:3235: dakṣiṇapaṃcālastu rājā adharmabhūyiṣṭhaścaṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati |
V05n745:3237: adharmabhūyiṣṭhatayā cāsya devo na kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhārāmanuprayacchati |
V05n745:3238: tato'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpannaḥ svajīvitāpekṣayā rāṣṭraparityāgaṃ kṛtvottarapaṃcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gatvā prativasati |
V05n745:3239: yāvadapareṇa samayena dakṣiṇapaṃcālo rājā mṛgayāvyapadeśena janapadānvyavalokanāya nirgato yāvatpaśyati grāmanagarāṇi śūnyāni udyānadevakulāni bhinnaprabhagnāni |
V05n745:3241: kasmādbhavanta imāni grāmanagarāṇi śūnyāni udyānadevakulāni va bhinnaprabhagnāni |
V05n745:3244: deva uttarapaṃcālasya rājño dhanasya viṣayaṃ gatāḥ |
V05n745:3249: deva uttarapaṃcālo rājā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati |
V05n745:3250: tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphīṭāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarāstaskararogāpagatāḥ |
V05n745:3253: devastu caṃḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo nityaṃ daṇḍanatāḍanaghātanadhāraṇabaṃdhanahaḍinigaḍoparodhaiḥ rāṣṭraṃ trāsayati yato'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpannaḥ uttarapaṃcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3255: bhavantaḥ ko'sāvupāyaḥ syād yenāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatyaiṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset |
V05n745:3257: yadi devaḥ uttarapaṃcālarājavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati maitracitto hitacitto'nukaṃpācitaḥ svarāṣṭraṃ pālayati nacirādasau janakāyaḥ punarāgatyaiṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset |
V05n745:3259: bhavanto yadyevamahamapyuttarapaṃcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayāmi maitracitto hitacitto'nukampācittaśca rāṣṭraṃ paripālayāmi |
V05n745:3260: yūyaṃ tathā kuruta yathāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatyaiṣu grāmanagareṣu prativasatīti |
V05n745:3265: atīva śasyasaṃpattirbhavati tena tatra śasyavatī vasumatī subhikṣānnapānaśca deśaḥ |
V05n745:3269: tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam |
V05n745:3270: ya uttarapaṃcālaviṣayājjanmacitraṃ nāgapotamānayet tasyemaṃ suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dāsyāmi mahatā ca satkāreṇa satkariṣyāmīti |
V05n745:3271: yāvadanyatama āhituṇḍikaḥ amātyānāṃ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati |
V05n745:3276: yo yuṣmākaṃ śraddhitaḥ pratyayitaśca tasya haste tiṣṭhatu |
V05n745:3279: tato'sāvāhituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3281: nimittīkṛtaṃ cāsau janmacitro nāgapota etasmin deśe pratiṣṭhatīti |
V05n745:3284: amātyānāṃ kathayati balyupahāraṃ me prayacchata saptame divase taṃ nāgapotamapahṛtyānayāmīti |
V05n745:3288: kiṃ karomi kaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye iti |
V05n745:3289: tasya ca hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ sārakaḥ phalakaśca |
V05n745:3291: yaḥ sthalagataḥ prāṇino mṛgaśaśaśarabhasūkarādayastad hradamupasarpanti tānpraghātayati ye'pi jalagatā matsyakacchapamaṇḍūkādayaḥ |
V05n745:3296: tato manuṣya veśamāsthāya phalakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3298: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca pūrvavadyāvacchālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannā iti |
V05n745:3301: sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati maitracitto hitacitto'nukampācittaśca rāṣṭraṃ pālayatīti |
V05n745:3307: yaḥ asmin hrade janmacitro nāma nāgapotaḥ prativasati sa kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhārāmanuprayacchati |
V05n745:3308: atīva śasyasaṃpattirbhavati śasyavatī vasumatī subhikṣānnapānaśca (deśaḥ) iti |
V05n745:3310: yadi kaścittaṃ nāgapotamito viṣayādapaharettasya nāgapotasya kiṃ syāt mātāpitṛviyogajamasya duḥkhaṃ syādrājño rāṣṭrasya ca |
V05n745:3315: sa balyupahāravidhānārthaṃ gataḥ saptame divase āgamiṣyati |
V05n745:3316: āgatyāsya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadirakīlakānnikhanya nānāraṃgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā mantrānāvartayoṣyati |
V05n745:3317: tatra tvayā pracchannaṃ saṃnnikṛṣṭe sthāne sthātavyam |
V05n745:3318: yadā tenāyamevaṃrupaḥ prayogaḥ kṛto bhavati tadā hradamadhyātkkathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati |
V05n745:3322: mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti |
V05n745:3323: yadyasau mantrānanupasaṃhṛtya prāṇairviyokṣyate mṛte'haṃ yāvajjīvameva mantrapāśabaddhaḥ |
V05n745:3326: yadi tavaikasyaivaṃ guṇaḥ syāttathāpyahamevaṃ kūryāṃ prāgeva sakalasya rāṣṭrasya |
V05n745:3329: yāvadasau lubdhaka saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gogayitvāvasthitaḥ |
V05n745:3331: tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakāḥ nikhātāḥ |
V05n745:3334: lubdhakena śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍito niṣkośaṃ cāsiṃ kṛtvābhihitaḥ |
V05n745:3337: mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti |
V05n745:3339: tena ca samanantaraṃ lubdhakena jīvitād vyavaropitaḥ |
V05n745:3340: tato nāgapoto mantrapāśabandhanādvinirmukto hradādabhyudgatya taṃ lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavānevaṃ cāha |
V05n745:3341: tvaṃ me mātā tvaṃ pitā yanmama tvamāgamya mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ notpannam |
V05n745:3343: tenāsau svabhuvanaṃ nīto nānavidhena cānnapānena saṃtarpito ratnāni copadarśitāni |
V05n745:3345: amba tāta eṣa me suhṛccharaṇyaṃ bāndhavo'syānubhāvānmama yuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti |
V05n745:3346: tābhyāmapyasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ratnāni dattāni |
V05n745:3349: tatra ṛṣiḥ prativasati maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ |
V05n745:3352: yaccāsya janmacitreṇa nāgapotena sārdhaṃ vṛttaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam |
V05n745:3354: kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena tasya bhuvane amogho nāma pāśastiṣṭhati taṃ yācasveti |
V05n745:3355: tato lubdhako'moghapāśe jātatṛṣṇaḥ ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhuvanaṃ gato yāvatpaśyati nāgabhuvanadvāre tamamoghaṃ pāśam |
V05n745:3357: eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prarthanīya iti viditvā nāgabhuvanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:3358: tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotenānyaiśca nāgapotaiḥ sasaṃbhramaṃ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ kathayati |
V05n745:3359: alaṃ me ratnaiḥ kiṃ tvetadamoghaṃ pāśaṃ mamānuprayaccheti |
V05n745:3365: yuṣmākameṣa garuḍabhayopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati mama tvanena satatameva prayojanam |
V05n745:3369: tena mātā pitarāvavalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ |
V05n745:3370: tato'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghaṃ pāśamādāya nāgabhuvanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3371: yāvadapareṇa samayena dhanī rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
V05n745:3372: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā |
V05n745:3373: sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:3374: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛhaṃ na me putro na duhitā |
V05n745:3376: sarvaṃ ca svāpateyamaputrakamiti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
V05n745:3382: so'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavarūṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnanyāṃśa devatāviśeṣānāyācate tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāścatvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate |
V05n745:3383: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
V05n745:3386: apitu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
V05n745:3392: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ sammukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
V05n745:3404: sa ceddārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
V05n745:3405: sā ceddārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
V05n745:3409: yathā ca me dakṣiṇakukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti |
V05n745:3417: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā (asmākaṃ nāmnā)
V05n745:3420: āpannasattvā caināṃ viditvā upari prāsādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇairaṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñaptairāhārairnātitiktairnātyamlairnātilavaṇairnātimadhurakairnātikaṭukairnātika-ṣāyaistiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitairāhārairhārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīmapsarasabhivanandanavanavihāriṇīṃ mañcātmañcaṃ pīṭhāta pīṭhamavatarantīmadharimāṃ bhūmim |
V05n745:3421: na cāsyāḥ kiñcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya |
V05n745:3422: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā |
V05n745:3424: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ |
V05n745:3429: deva diṣṭyā vardhase putraste jāta iti |
V05n745:3435: tasyaiva trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
V05n745:3442: dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām |
V05n745:3443: so'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiścottapterupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
V05n745:3446: pūrvavadyāvadaṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
V05n745:3447: sa yāni tāni bhavanti mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pūrvavadyāvat paṃcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ |
V05n745:3448: tasya pitrā trīṇyantaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyaḥ |
V05n745:3452: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ upari prāsādatalagato nuṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
V05n745:3453: yāvadapareṇa samayena phalako lubdhako mṛgānanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ |
V05n745:3454: tasya ca parvatasyādhastādroṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasaṃpannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicaritam |
V05n745:3458: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭaḥ papraccha |
V05n745:3461: asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsminpradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhuto dharmo dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā kasyacitsakāśāt |
V05n745:3467: asyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ paṃcadaśyāṃ paṃcadaśyāṃ manoharā nāma drumakinnararājasya duhi (tā paṃcakinnarīśataparivṛtā nānā)
V05n745:3470: ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena saptāhamadhināmayāmi |
V05n745:3476: yāvanmanoharā kinnarī paṃcakinnarīśataparivṛtā mahatyā vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkariṇīmavatīrṇā snātuṃ tatsamanantaraṃ ca phalakena lubdhakenāmoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣipto yena manoharā kinnarī baddhā |
V05n745:3477: tayā amoghapāśapāśitayā hrade mahānupamardaḥ kṛto vibhīṣaṇaśca śabdo niścāritaḥ |
V05n745:3478: yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarīgaṇaḥ itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto ma (no)
V05n745:3485: mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīrnaitattava suceṣṭitam |
V05n745:3486: rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava ||106 || iti |
V05n745:3491: yadi na śraddadhāsi ayaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ gṛhṇa |
V05n745:3499: tena khalu samayena sudhanaḥ kumāro mṛgayānirgataḥ |
V05n745:3500: adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam |
V05n745:3502: ayaṃ ca rājakumāra iyaṃ ca paramarūpadarśanīyā |
V05n745:3507: idaṃ mayā devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītaṃ pratigṛhyatāmiti |
V05n745:3508: adrākṣītsudhano rājakumārīṃ manoharāṃ kinnarīmabhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ prāsādikāṃ paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatāṃ sarvaguṇasamuditāmaṣṭādaśabhiḥ strīlakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtāṃ janapadakalyāṇīṃ kāṃcanakalaśakūrmapīnonnatakaṭhinasaṃhatasujātavṛttapragalamānastanīmabhinīlaraktāṃśukavisṛtāyatanava-kamalasadṛśanayanāṃ sudhruvamāyatataṃganāsāṃ bridrumamaṇiratnabimbaphalasaṃsthāna sadṛśādharoṣṭhīmādṛḍhaparipūrṇagaṃḍapārśvāmatyartharatikaraviśekarakapolatilakāmanupūrvaracitasaṃhatabhru vamaravindavikasadṛśaparipūrṇavimalaśaśivapuṣīṃ pralambabāhuṃ gambhīratrivalīkasannatamadhyāṃstanabhārāvanāmyamānapūrvārdhaṃ rathāṃgasaṃsthitasujātajaghanāṃ kadalīgarbhasadṛśakarā pūrvānuvatitasaṃhata sujātakarabhoruṃ sunigūḍhasuracitasarvāṃgasundarasirāṃ saṃhitamaṇicūḍāmāraktamaratalāṃ praharṣanūpuravalayahārārdhahāranirghoṣavilasitagatimāyatanīasūkṣmakeśīṃ śacīmiva bhraṣṭakāṃcīṃ nūpurāvacchāditapādāṃ chātodarīṃ tāṃ prakīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacāruvarṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta baddho dṛḍhaṃ rāgapāśena |
V05n745:3509: tatra sa rāgavahṇau dahanapataṃgasadṛśena jalacañcalacandravimalojjvalasvabhāvena durgāhyatareṇa nadītaraṅgakṣaṣamakaraduradhigamena garuḍapavanajavasamagatinā tulaparivartanalaghubānarāvasthitacapalodbhrāntatareṇa satatābhyāsakleśaniṣevaṇarāgasuravāsvādalolena sarvakleśaviṣamadurgaprapātaniḥsaṃgena paramalīnena cittena sadbhūtānurāgatayā ayoniśomanaskāradhanurvisṛtena saṃyogābhilaṣitaparamarahasyaśabdena kāmaśareṇa hṛdaye viddhaḥ āha ca |
V05n745:3513: sadyaḥ sa cetasi tu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ ||108 ||
V05n745:3514: sa tāmatimanoharāṃ manoharāṃ gṛhītvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3516: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā sārdhamupari prāsādatalagataḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
V05n745:3517: manoharayā rupayauvanaguṇenaḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro'nekaiścopacāraśataistathāpahṛto yathā sudhanaḥ kumāro muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti |
V05n745:3519: tatraiko rājānaṃ saṃśrito dvitīyaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāram |
V05n745:3520: yo rājānaṃ saṃśritaḥ sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca savibhaktaḥ |
V05n745:3521: yastu sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ sa bhogamātreṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ (sa) kathayati |
V05n745:3522: kumāra yadā tvaṃ pituratyayādrājye pratiṣṭhāsyasi tadā me kiṃ kariṣyasīti |
V05n745:3524: yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye sthāpitaḥ evamahaṃ tvāmapi paurohitye sthāpayāmīti |
V05n745:3525: eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparaṃparayā śrutaḥ |
V05n745:3527: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā kumāro rājyameva nāsādayiṣyati |
V05n745:3529: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rāġyo vijite anyatamaḥ kārvaṭiko viruddhaḥ |
V05n745:3530: tasya samucchittaye rājñā eko daṇḍaḥ preṣitaḥ |
V05n745:3536: deva kimarthaṃ svabalaṃ hāpyate parabalaṃ vardhyate |
V05n745:3551: evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutyāntaḥpuraḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:3556: deva sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum |
V05n745:3558: nirgataḥ kumāro'ntaḥ purāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na praviśatīti |
V05n745:3562: tataḥ kumāro nirgataḥ ukto gaccha kumāra sajjo balaugha iti |
V05n745:3569: sa manoharāsantakaṃ cūḍāmaṇimādāya mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayornipatya kathayati |
V05n745:3571: ayaṃ cūḍāmaṇiḥ suguptaḥ sthāpayitavyo na kathaṃ cinmanoharāyā deyo'nyatra prānaviyogāditi |
V05n745:3572: sa evaṃ mātaraṃ sandiśyābhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryaninādaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:3573: anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre'nya'nyatamadvṛkṣamūlaṃ niśrityaṃ vāsamupagataḥ |
V05n745:3574: tena khalu samayena vaiśravaṇo mahārājo'nekayakṣaparivāro'nekayakṣaśataparivāro'nekayakṣasahasraparivāro'nekayakṣaśatasahasraparivārastena pathā yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣasamitaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:3575: tena tasya pathā gacchataḥ khagapathe yānamavasthitam |
V05n745:3577: bahuśo'hamanena pathā samatikrānto na ca me kadācidyānaṃ pratihatam |
V05n745:3584: na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti divitvā pāṃcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate |
V05n745:3585: ehi tvaṃ pāṃcika sudhanasya kumārasya karvaṭakamayuddhena sannāmaya |
V05n745:3586: na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti |
V05n745:3587: tatheti pāṃcikena mahāyakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṃgo balakāyo nirmitaḥ |
V05n745:3588: tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣāḥ parvatapramāṇā hastinaḥ hastipramāṇā aśvāḥ |
V05n745:3589: tato nānākhaḍgamusalatomaraprāsacakraśaktiśaraparaśvaghaḥ śastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaughena pāṃcikaḥ karvaṭamanuprāptaḥ |
V05n745:3593: tataste karvaṭakanivāsinaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā vacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannā papracchuḥ |
V05n745:3603: vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ |
V05n745:3606: tataḥ ucchritadhvajapatākāḥ pūrṇakalaśairnānāvidhatūryaninādaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ |
V05n745:3607: tena ca samāśvāsitāstadabhiprāyāśca rājabhatāḥ sthāpitā nipakāśca gṛhītāḥ parapratyayāśca nibaddhāḥ |
V05n745:3608: tatastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ sphītīkṛtya sudhanaḥ kumāro nivṛttaḥ |
V05n745:3609: dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:3610: gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitaṃ sapta ca ratnāni gṛhaṃ praveśyamānāni dṛṣṭāni tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghuladhvevotthāya mahā(rha)
V05n745:3611: śayane niṣadya kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
V05n745:3612: mā haiva me ato nidānaṃ rāzyāccyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya vā antarāya iti |
V05n745:3613: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ taṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purīhitāya nivedayāmāsa |
V05n745:3615: yādṛśo devena svapno dṛṣṭo niyataṃ kumāreṇa karvaṭako nirjitaḥ |
V05n745:3616: vitathanirdeśaḥ karaṇīya iti iti viditvā kathayati |
V05n745:3618: niyatamano nidānaṃ devasya rājyāccyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāyaḥ |
V05n745:3622: deva udyāne puṣkariṇī surūpā prāmāṇikā kartavyāḥ |
V05n745:3625: tato devena snānaprayatena tām puṣkariṇīmekena sopānenāvataritavayam |
V05n745:3648: śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām ||112 || iti ||
V05n745:3652: puṣkariṇī khātā sudhayā liptā saṃmṛṣṭā kṣudramṛgāṇāṃ ca rudhiramupāvartitam |
V05n745:3660: tato manoharā sañjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:3668: tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni yuktā ca |
V05n745:3669: putrike prāpte te kāle āgantavyamevaṃ mamopālambho na bhaviṣyatīti |
V05n745:3670: tato rājā yathānirdiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkariṇībhavatīrṇottīrṇaḥ |
V05n745:3674: sparśasaṃgamane mahyaṃ hasitaṃ ramitaṃ ca me |
V05n745:3678: yadarthaṃ kṛto yatnaḥ sa na saṃpanno manoharā kinnarī palāyata iti |
V05n745:3680: deva siddho'rthaḥ apagatapāpo devaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ sāṃpratamiti |
V05n745:3683: yadi tena nākhyātamabhaviṣyat nāhaṃ grahaṇaṃ gatābhaviṣyam |
V05n745:3684: tena hi yāsyāmi tāvattasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśamiti |
V05n745:3691: yadi kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchenmāṃ samanveṣamāṇastasyemāmaṅgulimudrāṃ dāturmahasi |
V05n745:3695: yadi ca nirvāyamāṇo no tiṣṭhet tasya mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭumarhasi |
V05n745:3697: uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāstānatikramya apare trayastānatikramya apare trayastānatikramya apare trayastānatikramya himavān pravatarājaḥ |
V05n745:3699: tataḥ kūhako jalapathaḥ khadirakaḥ ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī tikīlakaḥ airāvatakaḥ adhunānaḥ pramokṣaṇaḥ |
V05n745:3701: tatra khadirake parvate guhāpraveśaḥ ekadhārake ca utkīlake |
V05n745:3706: ) guhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahatā ajagaro vegena praghāvati |
V05n745:3710: yatra paśyet dvau meṣau saṃghaṭṭantau parasparam |
V05n745:3715: yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet ||117 ||
V05n745:3720: naṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudanī hasanī āśīviṣā vetrāvatī ca |
V05n745:3724: āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ ||121 ||
V05n745:3734: tato manoharā tamṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā |
V05n745:3735: yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ sannāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ |
V05n745:3737: tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3760: sa cintāparaḥ praviṣṭo manoharāṃ na paśyati |
V05n745:3771: sa piturnairguṇyamupaśrutya kṛtaghnatāṃ ca mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:3776: hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam ||124 ||
V05n745:3782: putra kṛccchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptā manoharā iti mayā pramuktā |
V05n745:3789: uṣito jarmarājena yatra yātā manoharā ||126 || iti |
V05n745:3790: sa manoharāviyogaduḥkhārtaḥ kṛcchraṃ vilalāpa karuṇaṃ paridevamānaḥ |
V05n745:3792: pūrvavadyāvat kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam ||127 || iti |
V05n745:3798: sa tayā samāśvāsyamāno'pi śokasantaptastasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaścāmutaśca paribhramitumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:3817: tāta na śakyaṃ mayā tāmanānīyāntaḥpurasthena bhavitum |
V05n745:3819: (tato rājñā nagaraprākāraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārakṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpitā yathā kumāro na niṣkāsatīti |
V05n745:3830: yadi dvāreṇa yāsyāmi rājā dvārapālakān rakṣakāṃśca daṇḍenotsādayiṣyati yannvahamarakṣitena pathā gaccheyamiti |
V05n745:3831: sa rātryāṃ vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā yena rakṣiṇaḥ puṣā na santi tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvāvatīrṇaḥ |
V05n745:3842: svastyastu te cara sukhaṃ na mṛgārirasmi |
V05n745:3845: sa tāmatikramyānyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarairupabhujyamānasāram |
V05n745:3872: vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ
V05n745:3874: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumaraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodyovāca |
V05n745:3877: tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho
V05n745:3878: paścāt svasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ ||135 ||
V05n745:3882: yātāṃ ca māṃ drakṣyasi niścayena ||136 || iti |
V05n745:3885: kumāra viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ khedamāpatsyase nivartasveti |
V05n745:3886: yadi ca nivāryamāṇo na tiṣṭhet tasya mārgamupadeṣṭumarhasi |
V05n745:3888: uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāstānatikramyāpare trayastānapyatikramya himavān parvatarājaḥ |
V05n745:3890: tadyathā sudhā nāmauṣadhistayā ghṛtaṃ paktvā pātavyaṃ tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā smṛtibalaṃ ca vardhayati |
V05n745:3891: vānaraḥ samduāṇetavyo mantramadhyetavyaṃ saśaraṃ dhanurgrahītavyaṃ maṇayo'vabhāsātmakāḥ agado viṣaghātako'yaskolāstrayo vīṇā ca |
V05n745:3893: tataḥ kūjako jalapathaḥ khadirakaḥ ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī utkīlaka airāvatako'dhunānaḥ pramokṣaṇa ete parvatāḥ |
V05n745:3895: tatra khadirake parvate guhāpraveśa ekadhārake ca utkīlake |
V05n745:3899: ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalo hantavyaḥ |
V05n745:3904: yatra paśyeta dvau meṣau saṃghaṭṭantau parasparam |
V05n745:3909: yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet || 140 ||
V05n745:3914: naṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudanī hasanī āśīviṣā vetravatī ca |
V05n745:3918: āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ ||144 ||
V05n745:3923: āśīviṣāyāṃ sarpaviṣamantraprayogena samuttāro vetranadyāṃ tīkṣṇaśastrasaṃpātayogena samuttāraḥ |
V05n745:3927: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭān oṣadhamantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:3928: tatastena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpayitvā vānaram |
V05n745:3931: alaṃ kumāra kimanena vyavasāyena kiṃ manoharayā |
V05n745:3942: yatne kṛte yadi na sidhyati ko'tra doṣaḥ ||147 || iti |
V05n745:3943: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharopadiṣṭena vidhinā saṃprasthito'nupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogena vinirjitya drumasya kinnararājasya bhavanasamīpaṃ gataḥ |
V05n745:3952: asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā nāma |
V05n745:3956: kimete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante āhosvidāṇupūrveṇeti |
V05n745:3963: anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā tatprathamataraṃ snāpayitavyā |
V05n745:3966: tatastayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūdhni nipātito yāvadaṃgulimudrā utsaṅge nipatitā |
V05n745:3975: tāta yadyasau sudhanaḥ kumāra āgacched yenāhaṃ hṛtā tasya tvaṃ kiṃ kuryāḥ |
V05n745:3977: tamahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu dikṣu kṣipeyaṃ manuṣyaḥ asau kiṃ teneti |
V05n745:3983: yadyasau kumāra āgacchet tasya hi tvāṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtavittopakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryāratnaṃ dadyāmiti |
V05n745:3984: tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaḥ kumāro divyālaṅkāravibhūṣito drumasya kinnararājasyopadarśitaḥ |
V05n745:3985: tato drumaḥ kinnarājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśābhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam |
V05n745:3987: tatastasya jijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāstambhā ucchritā saptatālāḥ sapta bheryaḥ sapta śūkarāḥ | āha ca |
V05n745:3995: kuśalāśca bhavanti bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu devatāścaiṣāmautsukyamāpatsyante avighnabhāvāya |
V05n745:3996: tato bodhisattvo nṛtyagītavīṇāpaṇavasughoṣakavallarīmṛdaṅgādinānāvidhena daivatyopasaṃhatena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantādāpūryamāṇo'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ parivṛttaḥ |
V05n745:4001: nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ chettumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:4002: tatastān tilaśo'vakīrya saptatālān saptabherīḥ sapta ca śūkarān vāṇena vighya sumeruvadakampyo'vasthitaḥ |
V05n745:4003: tato gaganatalasthābhirdevatābhiśca kinnaraśatasahasrairhāhākārakilikilāprakṣveḍoccairnādo mukto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayamupagataḥ |
V05n745:4004: tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro'bhihitaḥ |

V05n745:6099: tato bhagavān meṇḍhakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya taṃ ca karvaṭakanivāsinaṃ janakāyaṃ yathābhavyatayā vinīya saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:6105: (bhikṣavo na jānate kena grahītavyaḥ kathaṃ ceti |

V05n745:6123: bhikṣavo na jānate kena grahītavyaṃ kathaṃ ceti |

V05n745:6133: yaduktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā guḍaḥ sāptāhiko'dhiṣṭhātavya iti |
V05n745:6136: adhvapratipannakena bhaktacchinnakena glānakena upadhivārikena navakarmikena ceti |
V05n745:6138: taṇḍulānāṃ ca satkunāṃ ca madhye guḍaṃ prakṣipanti |

V05n745:6158: ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu (dehinām |

V05n745:6161: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ naimittikairdvādaśavārṣikī anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā śalākāvṛti mahādurbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |

V05n745:6173: tasmin kāle kāle manuṣyāḥ khālabilebhyo dhānyaguḍakāni śalākayākṛṣya bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ kkāthayitvā pibanti |
V05n745:6176: śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā naimittikairdvādaśavārṣikyanāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā śalākāvṛtti durbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyati cañcu śvetāsthi ca |

V05n745:6182: bho puruṣa bhaviṣyati me saparivārasya dvādaśavārṣikaṃ bhaktamiti |

V05n745:6207: evaṃ putreṇa snuṣayā dāsena dāsyāṃ svasvapratyaṃśāḥ parityaktāḥ |
V05n745:6208: tatastaiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍena pratipāditaḥ |
V05n745:6209: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ na vācikī |
V05n745:6210: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalana tapana-varṣaṇa-vidyotana-prātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ |

V05n745:6214: yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛto'nenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadi riktakāni koṣakoṣṭhāgārāṇi paśyāmi sahadarśanānme pūrṇāni syuḥ |
V05n745:6215: evaṃvidhānāṃ ca me dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām |
V05n745:6218: yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛto'nenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekasyarthāya sthālīṃ paceyaṃ sā śatenāpi paribhujya sahasreṇāpi na ca parikṣayaṃ gacched yanmayā prayogo na pratiprasrabdhaḥ |
V05n745:6222: yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛto'nena me kuśalamūlena paṃcaśataḥ kamarakaḥ kaṭyāmupānibaddhastiṣṭhet |
V05n745:6223: yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tato vyayaṃ kuryāṃ pūrṇaka eva tiṣṭhet ṃā parikṣayaṃ gacchet |
V05n745:6227: yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛto'nenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekasyārthāya gandhāna yojaye te śatasya vā sahasrasya vā upayujyeran na ca parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ |
V05n745:6232: yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛto'nenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadyekaṃ sīraṃ karṣeyaṃ saptasīrāḥ kṛṣṭā bhaveyuḥ |
V05n745:6236: yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛto'nenāhaṃ kuśalamūchena (dhānyānāme)
V05n745:6241: sa ca mahātmā pratyekabuddhasteṣāmanukampāṃ kṛtvā ṛddhyā saṃprasthitaḥ |
V05n745:6243: tasya ṛddhyā gacchato rājño brahmadattasyoparicchāyā nipatitā |
V05n745:6250: sau gṛhapatiḥ koṣakoṣṭhāgārāṇi pratyavekṣitumārabdho (yāvat pūrṇāni paśyati |
V05n745:6252: mama tāva) tpraṇidhānaṃ pūrṇaṃ yuṣmākamidānīṃ paśyāma iti |
V05n745:6268: yāvatsarva eva lokaḥ kālagastadā tena gṛhapatinā koṣakoṣṭhāgārānyuddhāṭitāni |
V05n745:6272: gṛhapatate yadā sarvalokaḥ kālagastadā tvayā koṣakoṣṭhāgārāṇyudghāṭitānīti |
V05n745:6284: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'so gṛhapatirgṛhapatipatnī gṛhapatiputro gṛhapatidāso gṛhapatidāsī ca |
V05n745:6285: eṣa evāsau meṇḍhako gṛhapatirmeṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī ca |
V05n745:6286: ya ebhiḥ pratyekabuddhakrārānkṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍapi mahāpuṇyā jātā mamāntike satyāni dṛṣṭāni |
V05n745:6287: ahaṃ caibhiḥ pratyekabuddhakoṭīśatasahastrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgita iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ ekāntaśulkānāmekāntaśulko vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
V05n745:6288: tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīya ityevaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam |
V05n745:6296: kutraṃ tvahaṃ caturṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam |

V05n745:6305: paśyatyasmākameva caturṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayitukāma iti viditvā pāñcikasya mahāyakṣasenāpaterājñāṃ dattavān |
V05n745:6306: gaccha pāñcika bhagavato'rthāya mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇāstīre śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kuru |
V05n745:6310: sa mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre kaineyasyarṣerārakṣakaṃ sthāpayitvā śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kartumārabdhaḥ |
V05n745:6325: tasya śramaṇasya gautamasya ko rakṣāṃ karotīti |
V05n745:6328: sa eva bhagavān sadevakasya lokasya rakṣāṃ karotīti śrutvā kaineyarṣistūṣṇīm |
V05n745:6329: tato bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāyodumāṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāt |
V05n745:6330: udumāṃ piṇḍāya cāritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścād bhaktapiṇḍapātaṃ pratikrāntastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte udumāyāmantarhito mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre pratyaṣṭhāt sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
V05n745:6331: atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |

V05n745:6341: kumudapadmapuṇḍarīkamandārakaiḥ puṣpairākīrya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā paścimāṃ diśaṃ niḥsṛtya niṣaṇṇo bhagavantaṃ saṃpuraskṛtya bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
V05n745:6342: vaiśravaṇo'pi mahārājo'nekayakṣaparivāro'nekayakṣaśataparivāro'nekayakṣasahasraparivāro'nekayakṣaśatasahasraparivāro divyasya hiraṇyasya suvarṇasyotsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |

V05n745:6347: sa cedahamāryayā vācā dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ dvau cājñasyato dvau nājñāsyataḥ |
V05n745:6348: sa ced dasyuvācā deśayeyamevamapi dvau cājñāsyato dvau nājñāsyataḥ |
V05n745:6351: iti hi mahārāja jīrṇaḥ kāyo vedanā śītībhūtā saṃjñā niruddhā saṃskārā vyupaśāntā vijñānamastaṃgatam |
V05n745:6353: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannamanekeṣāṃ ca tatsabhāgānāṃ gandharvaśatasahasrāṇām |
V05n745:6356: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamātraṃ bhavatu śrute cintite vijñāte vijñātamātram |
V05n745:6357: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe virūḍhakasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannamanekeṣāṃ ca tatsabhāgānāṃ kumbhāṇḍaśatasahasrāṇām |
V05n745:6359: iti hi mahārāja ene mene daṣphe daṇḍaṣphe eṣa evānto duḥkhasyeti |
V05n745:6360: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe virūpakṣasya mahārājasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannamanekeṣāṃ ca tatsabhāgānāṃ kumbhāṇḍaśatasahasrāṇām |
V05n745:6362: atra te mahārāja māṣā tuṣā saṃśāmā sarvatra virāṭhi eṣa evānto duḥkhasyeti |

V05n745:6367: sa ceddevānāṃ devāḥ pramattā rativahulā na cirasthitikaṃ bhaviṣyati |
V05n745:6368: atha manuṣyāṇāmalpāyuṣo manuṣyā evameva na cirasthitikameva |
V05n745:6369: yattvahaṃ devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca kāśyapasya ca bhikṣo śāsanamupanyasya parinirvāyāmiti viditvā dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ mahārājamāmantrayate |
V05n745:6370: mama te mahārāja parinirvṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi śāsane ārakṣā karaṇīyeti |
V05n745:6372: tvayāpi mahārāja dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ārakṣā karaṇīyeti virūpākṣaṃ mahārājamāmantrayate |
V05n745:6373: tvayāpi mahārāja paścimasyāṃ diśi ārakṣā karaṇīyeti |
V05n745:6375: tvayāpi mahārāja uttarasyāṃ diśi ārakṣā karaṇīyeti |
V05n745:6378: vayamārakṣāṃ kariṣyāma iti viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dṛṣṭasatyā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntāḥ |
V05n745:6382: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃyacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paprayacchuḥ |
V05n745:6383: kiṃ bhadanta caturbhirmahārājaiḥ karma kṛtya yasya karmaṇo vipākena catvāro mahārājāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
V05n745:6388: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo'sminneva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajayāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi |
V05n745:6390: tena khalu samayena mahāsamudre dvau nāgau prativasataḥ śvasau mahāśvāsaśca |
V05n745:6392: yadā śvāsamahāśvāsau tābhyāmabhidrūyete tadā pātālaṃ praviśataḥ |
V05n745:6394: tau ca suparṇinau abhidravitumārabdhau na śaknuvataḥ |
V05n745:6397: idānīṃ ko heturyena vayaṃ sumerupratyāhatapavanasalile iva vyasanamāsādya pratinivṛttāviti |
V05n745:6402: tau tābhyāṃ sārdhaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike saṃmprasthitau |
V05n745:6404: catvāraśca lokapālāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyantikād dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃprasthitāḥ |
V05n745:6410: yadyevaṃ vayamapi kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāccharaṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni saṃgṛhītvā praṇidhānaṃ kurma iti |
V05n745:6413: tataḥ saṃbhūyaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādayornipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ |
V05n745:6414: yathaite catvāro lokapālāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svabhavanaṃ saṃprasthitā evaṃ vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena catvāro lokapālāḥ syāma |
V05n745:6415: yaścādau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro mānavo vyākṛtaḥ - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ mānavavarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
V05n745:6416: so'pyasmākaṃ bhagavāneva mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre dharma deśayet |
V05n745:6417: vayaṃ ca taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭasatyā evameva svabhavanaṃ gacchāma iti |
V05n745:6418: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo ye te catvāro nāgasuparṇinaḥ eta eva te catvāro lokapālāḥ |
V05n745:6419: yo'sau śvāsaḥ eṣa evāsau dhṛtarāṣṭrastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:6420: mahāśvāso viruḍhakaḥ aṭṭeśvaro'sau virūpākṣaścūḍeśvaro'sau vaiśravaṇastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:6421: yadebhiḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāccharaṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni pratigṛhya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena catvāro lokapālā jātā mamāntike satyadarśanaṃ kṛtvā svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ |
V05n745:6422: tāṃ ca dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā kaineya ṛṣiḥ paraṃ vismayamupāgato bhagavati cābhiprasannaḥ |
V05n745:6423: tato'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī tacurāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā |
V05n745:6425: tato'sau avetyaprasādasamanvāgato'ṣṭau pānānyādāya cocapānaṃ mocapānaṃ kolapānamaśvatthapānamudumbarapānaṃ paruṣikapānaṃ kharjūrapānaṃ mṛdvīkāpānaṃ ca yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:6427: imāni bhadanta aṣṭau pānāni pūrvakaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ stutāni varṇitāni |
V05n745:6429: pratigṛhṇāti bhagavān kaineyasya ṛṣerantikādaṣṭau pānāni anukampāmupādāya |
V05n745:6431: itīmāni bhikṣavo'ṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāṇi akāle marditāni akāle parisrutāni akāle'dhiṣṭhitāṇi paścādbhaktena paribhoktavyāni |
V05n745:6432: itīmānī aṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāṇi kāle marditāni akāleparisrutānyakāle'dhiṣṭhitāni na paribhoktavyāni |
V05n745:6433: itīmāni aṣṭau pānāni kāle pratigrāhitāni kāle marditāni kāle parisrutāni akāle'dhiṣṭhitāni na paribhoktavyāni |
V05n745:6434: itīmānī aṣṭau pānāni akāle marditāni akāle parisrutāni paścādbhaktena paribhoktavyāni |
V05n745:6436: atha kaineyarṣirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:6437: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo bhaktena sādhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti |
V05n745:6440: bhagavānapi mandākinyāḥ puṣkariṇyāstīre'ntarhita udumāyāṃ pratyaṣṭhātsārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
V05n745:6446: tena khalu samayena śailo nāma ṛṣiḥ kaineyasya ṛṣerbhāgineyastasminnāvasathe rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ |
V05n745:6450: rājā vā māgadhaśreṇyo biṃbisāro rāṣṭranivāsī janakāyo yathepsitasya vā ṛṣidharmasya parisamāptiriti |
V05n745:6452: na me śaila sabrahmacāriṇa upanimantritā nāpi rājā māgadhaśreṇyo biṃbisāro rāṣṭranivāsī janakāyo nāpi yathepsitasya ṛṣidharmasya parisamāptiḥ |
V05n745:6453: api tu mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantrita iti tasya buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpānyāhṛṣṭāni |
V05n745:6455: ka eṣa ṛṣe buddho nāma iti |
V05n745:6456: asti śaila śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayāgārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ |
V05n745:6462: santi śaila kṣatriyakulādapi kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayāgārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ |
V05n745:6463: santi brāhmaṇakulādapi vaiśyakulādapi kulaputrāḥ pūrvavat tameva bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pravrajitāḥ |
V05n745:6464: sa eṣa ṛṣe saṃgho nāma iti |
V05n745:6465: ayaṃ ca śaila sṃghaḥ pūrvakaśca buddhaḥ |
V05n745:6466: sa eṣa buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho mayā bhaktenopanimantritaḥ |
V05n745:6467: atha śailaṛṣirbuddhālambanayā smṛtyā kālyamevotthāya pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:6469: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n745:6470: labdhavān śailaṛṣiḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam |
V05n745:6471: atha kaineyaṛṣistāmeva śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pūrvavadyāvatsantarpayati saṃpravārayati |
V05n745:6472: tena buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayamānena śailaḥ pravrajito dṛṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:6477: atha kaineya ṛṣiranekaparyāyena buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghaṃ śucinā praṇītena khādanīyamojanīyena santarpya sampravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
V05n745:6478: tato bhagavāṃstasmai dakṣiṇāmādiśya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:6479: atha kaineya ṛṣiryattatrotpādanadharmakaṃ sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakaṃ kṛtvā pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:6482: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
V05n745:6483: labdhavān kaineya ṛṣiḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam |
V05n745:6484: atha bhagavāṃstadbhikṣusahasraṃ pravrajyopasampādya nadyāḥ prabhadrikāyāstīre vāsamupagataḥśchatrāmbuvane |
V05n745:6488: tatra ye āyuṣmatā brāhmaṇakapphiṇenāvacoditāstaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:6491: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:6492: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān śāriputro mahāprajñānāmagryo vyākṛtaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahāmaudgalyāyano mahardhikānāṃ mahānubhāvānām |
V05n745:6493: atha ca punarye āyuṣmatā brāhmaṇakapphiṇenāvacoditāstairarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
V05n745:6497: bhikṣava etarhi yathā tathātīte'pyadhvani ye brāhmaṇakapphiṇenāvacoditāste ārūpyaghātau pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
V05n745:6504: tatastasya māṇavakā guruviyogaduḥkhadaurmanasyasantaptā itaścāmutaśca paribhramantastasya dvitīyasyarṣeḥ sakāśamupasakrāntāḥ |
V05n745:6517: tatra yasya pañcaśatāni dattāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā ārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāni |
V05n745:6518: yasyārdhatṛtīyāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā rūpadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitāṇi |
V05n745:6519: yasyāpyardhatṛtīyāni tena tathāvacoditāni yathā pañcasvabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpitāni |
V05n745:6520: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau ṛṣiryena tāni pañcamāṇavakaśatānyārūpyadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitānyeṣa evāsau kapphiṇo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:6521: yenārdhatṛtīyāni rūpadhātau pratiṣṭhāpitānyeṣa evāso maudgalyāyano bhikṣuḥ |
V05n745:6522: yenāpyardhatṛtīyāni śatāni pañcasvabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpitāni eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ |
V05n745:6523: api tu bhikṣavo ye kapphiṇenāvacoditāste tīkṣṇendriyāḥ |
V05n745:6526: yadi śāriputreṇāvacoditā nābhaviṣyan uṣmagatā apyanayagatā abhaviṣyan |
V05n745:6533: vivāhaḥ kiṃ nu rājā vā rāṣṭraṃ vopanimantritam |
V05n745:6534: athavā te mahāprajña pṛṣṭa ācakṣva tanmama ||473 ||
V05n745:6535: na me vivāho rājā vā rāṣṭraṃ vopanimantritam |
V05n745:6537: so'yaṃ buddhaṃ iti śrutvā śailaḥ saṃvegamāgataḥ |
V05n745:6545: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśīṃ ca tasmād buddho nirucyate ||478 ||
V05n745:6554: vārāṇasīṃ purīṃ gatvā taṃ namasye kṛtāñjaliḥ ||482 ||
V05n745:6589: duḥkhaṃ naikaprakāraṃ ca yacca duḥkhasya saṃbhavam |
V05n745:6604: abhidhyā nāsya kāmeṣu maitracittaḥ sa jantuṣu ||507 ||
V05n745:6607: śṛṇoti vividhāñchabdhān ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ |
V05n745:6608: cittaṃ pareṣāṃ jānāti kliṣṭaṃ vā yadi vāśubham ||509 ||
V05n745:6612: śāntendriyaḥ śāntacittaḥ pūrṇo vā dhyāyate hṛdi ||511 ||
V05n745:6617: yo'pi varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣeta tāyinaḥ |
V05n745:6620: dṛṣṭvā ye śaraṇaṃ yānti teṣāṃ lābhabharastataḥ ||515 ||
V05n745:6621: saṃvinno brāhmaṇaḥ śailaḥ śrutvā varṇaṃ mahāmuneḥ |
V05n745:6623: na me manuṣyabhūtasya varṇa etādṛśaḥ śrutaḥ |
V05n745:6625: mānadhvajaṃ prahāya tvaṃ vaṇijo vā dhanārthikaḥ |
V05n745:6628: niryāti brāhmaṇaḥ śailo yena buddhāśramaḥ śubhaḥ ||419 ||
V05n745:6639: carāmi virajo loke śuddhaḥ śuci nirāmayaḥ |
V05n745:6642: mā pariklāntakāyo'si kaccid brāhmaṇa te sukham ||526 ||
V05n745:6654: dvayaṃ tatra na paśyāmi tava gātreṣu gautama ||532 ||
V05n745:6660: udumbare vā kusumaṃ durlabho hi mahāmuniḥ ||535 |
V05n745:6661: vari grīṣmābhitapto vā bhojanaṃ vā bubhukṣitaḥ |
V05n745:6665: ubhe ca cakṣuṣī śrotre pracchādayati jihvayā |
V05n745:6668: adrākṣīd brāhmaṇaḥ śailo guhyaṃ koṣāvṛtaṃ muniḥ ||539 ||
V05n745:6678: vartayati kṣitau cakraṃ rajā bhava mahīpatiḥ ||544 ||
V05n745:6683: smṛtirvāhmaṇa cakraṃ me prajñā me parināyakaḥ |
V05n745:6684: vīryaṃ hayaḥ śīghrajavo dhuraṃ vahati coditaḥ ||547 ||
V05n745:6687: strī vai ratiḥ sarāgāṇāṃ prītirbrāhmaṇa me ratiḥ |
V05n745:6688: prasṛṣṭaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ dhanaṃ gṛhagataṃ mayā ||549 ||
V05n745:6691: jitā mayā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśatrurna vidyate |
V05n745:6692: catasro me parṣadaśca caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ mama ||551 ||
V05n745:6710: śūrayuddhaṃ mayā dattaṃ dharmabherī mayā hatā |
V05n745:6714: trayo loke mahācaurā yairiyaṃ bādhyate prajā |
V05n745:6715: rāgo dveṣaśca mohaśca sarve te nāśitā mayā ||562 ||
V05n745:6720: daṃṣṭrābalī yathā siṃha āsādya prāṇino vane |
V05n745:6721: samaṃ teṣu praharati bālye madhye mahallake ||565 ||
V05n745:6724: āturasya ca me ha tvaṃ kāṃkṣāṃ vinaya gautama |
V05n745:6731: pravartayasi kevalaṃ cakraṃ yathā gautama bhāṣase ||570 ||
V05n745:6744: idaṃ bhavantaḥ śṛṇuta cakṣuṣmān bhāṣate yathā |
V05n745:6746: ya icchantyanugacchantu ye necchanti vrajantu te |
V05n745:6767: saddharmaṃ ca dhanaśreṣṭhaṃ śikṣāṃ ca jinavarṇitāṃ |
V05n745:6770: buddhaṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca satkṛtiṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajet ||589 ||
V05n745:6776: atha bhagavān kāśīṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran kāśīpaṭṭamanuprāptaḥ |
V05n745:6777: tasmiṃśca kāśīpaṭṭe śobhitapūrviṇau dvau pitāputrau pravrajitau |
V05n745:6779: bhagavān śrāvakasaṃghaḥ kāśīṣu janapade cārikāṃ carannihānuprāptaḥ śrāntakāyo bhagavānbhikṣusaṃghaśca |
V05n745:6809: tato'sau gṛhapatiḥ śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pūrvavadyāvatpurastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapya evāsane niṣaṇṇastatra praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ cāryate |
V05n745:6820: yaḥ kaścidādīnavo bhikṣavo jātīyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ dhārayanti |
V05n745:6823: upasthāpayati sātisāro bhavati sthāpayitvā vaidyapūrviṇāṃ śastrakoṣaṃ kāyasthapūrviṇāmapi bhājanaṃ sūcikapravrajitānāṃ sūcīgṛhamiti |
V05n745:6829: aśrauṣuḥ pāpeyā mallā bhagavān malleṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran pāpāmanuprāptaḥ pāpāyāṃ viharati jalūkāvanaṣaṇḍa iti |
V05n745:6832: bhagavānmalleṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran pāpāmanuprāptaḥ pāpāyāṃ viharati jalūkāvanaṣaṇḍa iti |
V05n745:6833: sacedasmākamekaiko buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyati apare'vakāśaṃ na lapsyante |
V05n745:6837: yo yuṣmākamekākī bhojayati sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭiṃ kārṣāpaṇān daṇḍya iti |
V05n745:6838: atha pāpeyā mallāḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
V05n745:6839: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
V05n745:6840: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān papeyān mallān bhagavāndharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
V05n745:6841: atha pāpeyā mallā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:6842: adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavan śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhkikṣusaṃghena |
V05n745:6844: atha pāpeyā mallā bhagavatastūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandhānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanātprakrāntaḥ |
V05n745:6856: ayaṃ bhadanta roco mallamahāmātro na buddhe |
V05n745:6858: sādhvasya bhagavāṃstathā dharmaṃ deśayad yathaiva buddhe'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe abhiprasīdediti |
V05n745:6860: atha bhagavatā rocasya mahāmātrasya tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā roco mallamahāmātro buddhe'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe'bhiprasannaḥ |
V05n745:6861: atha roco mallamahāmātraḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamidamavocat |
V05n745:6862: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
V05n745:6864: adhivāsayatu me bhagavānāhaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā pāpeyā mallā anujñāsyanti |
V05n745:6865: sacette roca pāpeyā malā anujñāsyanti evaṃ te'hamadhivāsayāmi |
V05n745:6866: atha roco mallamahāmātro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena pāpeyā mallāstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
V05n745:6868: āgamayantu tāvad bhavanto yāvadahaṃ tatprathamataraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojaye bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
V05n745:6869: paścādyuṣmākamapi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati bhagavantaṃ bhojayituṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ caṃ |
V05n745:6871: asmābhistatprathamataraṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrito na vayamanujānīya iti |
V05n745:6873: yadi nānujānītha ekaṃ khādyakaṃ cārayāmi pānakaṃ ceti |
V05n745:6876: anujānīmaḥ sacet saṃghagatā tena dakṣiṇā pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavati |
V05n745:6879: bhavantastādṛśaṃ khādyakaṃ sajjīkuruta yenekenaiva paryāptirbhavati ahaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni dadāmīti |
V05n745:6883: atha pāpeyā mallāstāmeva rātriṃ śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya pūrvavadyāvatpurastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ |
V05n745:6884: tato roco mallamahāmātraḥ khādyakaṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ pānakaṃ ca |
V05n745:6898: ehi buddha ehi dharma ehi saṃgha idaṃ gṛhāṇeti |
V05n745:6901: praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo'sau bhagavān dvipadānāmagrya iti |
V05n745:6907: evaṃ dharme vaktavyaṃ yo'sau virāgāṇāmagrya iti |
V05n745:6912: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān svātirnavāgatastaruṇo'cirapravrajitaḥ acirāgata imaṃ dharmavinayam |
V05n745:6914: uktaṃ bhagavatā yaiścālpaṃ dattaṃ yaiśca prabhūtaṃ dattaṃ yaiśca praṇītaṃ dattaṃ yaiścāttamanaskaiḥ parikarma kṛtaṃ yaiśca prasannacittairabhyanumoditaṃ sarve te puṇyasya bhāgino bhavanti |
V05n745:6916: sa kāṣṭhaṃ pāṭayitumārabdho yāvadanyatamasmātpūtidārusuṣirānniṣkramyāśīviṣeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṅguṣṭhe daṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:6917: sa viṣeṇa saṃmūrchito bhūtau patito lālā vāhayati mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayati akṣiṇī ca samparivartayati |
V05n745:6925: yadi na pravrajito'bhaviṣyat jñātibhirasya vikitsā kāritā abhaviṣyaditi |
V05n745:6938: āryā yuṣmākameva śāstā sarvajño bhagavānsarvadarśī sa eva jñāysatīti |
V05n745:6940: vikṛtabhojanaṃ bhikṣavaṃ uccāraḥ prasrāvaśchāyikāṃ mṛttikā ca |
V05n745:6941: tatra uccāraḥ acirajātakānāṃ vatsakānāṃ teṣāmeva ca prasrāvaḥ |
V05n745:6949: śakṣyasi tvamānanda mamāntikānmahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāmudgṛhya paryavāpya svāterbhikṣo rakṣāṃ kartuṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca |
V05n745:6951: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ bhāṣate sma |
V05n745:6952: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya |
V05n745:6953: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṃgale hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani sarvamaṅgalasādhani manase mahāmānase acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi |
V05n745:6955: brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvate rakṣa svātiṃ sarvopadravabhayarogebhyaḥ svāhā |
V05n745:6956: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavato'ntikānmahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāmudgṛhya paryavāpya svāterbhikṣoḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:6958: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
V05n745:6959: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvacca bhagavatā mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā bahukarā ca |
V05n745:6960: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā mamātīte'pyadhvanyakṣaṇapratipannasya vinipatitaśarīrasyāpi mahāmūyūrī vidyārājā upakarā bahukarā ca |
V05n745:6962: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo himavati parvatarāje dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājaṃ prativasati sma |
V05n745:6963: so'nayā mahāmāyūryā vidyayā kālyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā divā svastyayanena viharati |
V05n745:6964: so'yaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svastyayanena viharati |
V05n745:6965: so'pareṇa samayena saṃbahulābhirvanamayūrībhiḥ sārdhamārāmeṇārāmamudyanenodyānaṃ parvatapārśveṇa parvatapārśvamatyarthaṃ kāmarāgaraktaḥ kāme'nugṛddho grathito mūrchito madamattaḥ pramuḍhaḥ pramūrchitaḥ pravicaranpramādādanyataraṃ parvatavivaramanupraviṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:6966: sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairhiṃsakairavatāra prekṣibhirmayūrapāśairbaddhaḥ |
V05n745:6967: so'pyatra madhyagataḥ pramūḍhaḥ smṛtiṃ ca labdhvā imāmeva mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ manasyakārṣīt |
V05n745:6968: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṅgalye hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvāthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani sarvamaṅgalyasādhani manasi mānasi mahāmānasi acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje amare amṛte (amarāṇi)
V05n745:6969: brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvate rakṣa māṃ sarvopadravebhyaḥ svāhā |
V05n745:6971: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājastena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:6972: tadāpi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ca etarhyapi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ceti |
V05n745:6973: paśya bhadanta yāvacca bhagavataḥ svāterbhikṣorvidyayā svastyayanaṃ kṛtam |
V05n745:6976: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nāgamaṇḍaliko'nyatamaḥ kṣatriyadārakaḥ sarpeṇa daṣṭaḥ |
V05n745:6979: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau nāgamaṇḍalikaḥ ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena |
V05n745:6980: yo'sau dārakaḥ svātirbhikṣastena kālena tena samayena |
